0b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'jig mas ras kyi pha tsho btu byos ma ma pa'i pha rolong kyin pa'i/ bco ldam rangs kyis bka' stsal ba / gdod sems dang bzod par phyogs su myong po'i phyir rogagasapa/ 
0b2('bum): pabacom ldan 'das 'di lta ste gsas kyi pha rol tu phyi dang pa ni ni bcod 'grus kyi 'am nang pa'o// ldan 'das kyis bka' sa/ lang bkale lo dang bcom 'bras dmyigs su byed pa'i phyir ro// gso
0b3('bum): ma ldan 'das 'din tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed rab don bsamam gyi pha rol tuldan 'das gis bka' stsard pa/ bsam gtan dang 'jug pa dmyigs su myed pa sbyi chogasas/ 
0b4('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste shes rab kyi sa ro tu ma pa sa rab kyi man can pa ldan 'das kyis bkang stsal / shes rab dang 'chal ba'i shes rab bya
0b5('bum): myed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'ji lta ste zhes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'angan so tshul pha rol da phyi dang pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa / chos tham
0b6('bum): sa sub pa med pa'i phyi / papo med pa bcom can 'das 'di lta ste shes ras kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa 'dzin gyi 'jigs pabaso pa rlo med du phyin pa'o// com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la dpag 'am gyen pa pa shes
0b7('bum): gamams pa med par ro/ gas pa bcomaldan 'das 'ang lta de shes rab kyi pha rol bdu pa pa 'don so so mas dad par rig pa'i pha de la du phyinang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
0b8('bum): 'i'adi sa pha rol phyin ba 'di ni snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyir pa
1b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i ni 'di lta ste// dadapa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
1b2('bum): dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / seng ge rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'ja ning dang / zla ba bzang
1b3('bum): bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ti nga nge 'dzind dang / chos thus
1b4('bum): cad las shin tu 'phags pa na sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge
1b5('bum): 'dzin dang / spyi mug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini dang
1b6('bum): nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'ja nid dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'ja nid dang / chos thams
2a1('bum): chos thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed
2a2('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar
2a3('bum): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs
2a4('bum): 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad nga dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
2a5('bum): nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i na dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'i dpung rgyan zhes
2a6('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po 'dingalo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / srang gi rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
2a7('bum): ma gon zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini dang / rkyen mongs po sreng bzhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gnas
2a8('bum): sa rten pa med po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa zhes pa ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
2b1('bum): byed pa zhes bya 'i bye zhi nga/ na tu sna ba sa pa hrI da/ dag 'dus pazhes bya 'i ting 'dzi drug 'od dris med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nga
2b2('bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / klog gi sprin ma zhes bya bo'i ting nge 'dzin nga / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
2b3('bum): brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
2b4('bum): sanyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab skyon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba zhes bya
2b5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lto bru
2b6('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha
2b7('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
2b8('bum): 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini dang
3a1('bum): yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya
3a2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa
3a3('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'jani dang / yon tan thams cad
3a4('bum): tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems ma nga par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
3a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
3a6('bum): thams cad lus 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba byed pa zhes bya/ 
3a7('bum): la'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam
3a8('bum): pam 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tring nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi
3b1('bum): ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgren ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmyigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
3b2('bum): 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug sngal las thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa
3b3('bum): za ma tog ge ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad
3b4('bum): yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthu dan pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
3b5('bum): ting nge 'dzini dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / klog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi te na dang / rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa
3b6('bum): thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs
3b7('bum): pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas dmyagasu med pa la brtson pa zhes bya
3b8('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang gde bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha'
4a1('bum): ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da // / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4a2('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u brgyad pa'o// / de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na// ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul la spyod pa
4a3('bum): ste/ 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na// ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa lta bur gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rin
4a4('bum): chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'di ni seng
4a5('bum): ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad to// de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la/ gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di
4a6('bum): zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nid te// de la zla ba bzang po rgyu la mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na ting nge 'dzin doni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ 'di
4a7('bum): ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad
4a8('bum): kyis mngon par 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad las nin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting 'dzind de la gan
4b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya la rnam par gnas pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la spyi sdug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
4b2('bum): de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad thams cad kyi spyi myug rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni spyi rtsig rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
4b3('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'ja ni de la gnas shing chos kyi dbyings su rtogs par 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
4b4('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan nges par 'dzind pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i rgyu la mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje zhes
4b5('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la 'ganas shing / ti/ nge 'dzind thams cad 'jig par mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rdza rje zhe bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la chos thams cad la 'jug
4b6('bum): pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhel 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind to// 
4b7('bum): de la ting nge 'dzin do la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin la
4b8('bum): rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gad ng+ge la 'od zer rang ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer
5a1('bum): rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
5a2('bum): thams cad kyi stobs rnam par 'god pa ste/ 'di ni dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gan
5a3('bum): rashing ting nge 'dzind thams cad yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting
5a4('bum): de 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstand pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
5a5('bum): 'dzand to// de la tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas TI shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa
5a6('bum): sti 'di ni cig bla dag sa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i te nge 'dzin to// de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzinang thams cad
5a7('bum): kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin do// de la phyag rgya yong su 'dzind pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / ting nge
5a8('bum): 'dzi nad thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la nyamaHpa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la
5b1('bum): gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad nyam par mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la chos thams cad la yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang
5b2('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad 'dra zhing khongs su chud par 'dong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad yang dag paro 'dra ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la
5b3('bum): nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/ 'di ni na mkha' rgyas par
5b4('bum): 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rdo rje'i dkyila'akhor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzi nad thams cad kyi dkyil 'kho/ 
5b5('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind/ gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / 
5b6('bum): nyon mo mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu selang pa ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzinang de la gnas shi/ 
5b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me ldan no/ ljang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par snang ba zhis bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de ma tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzinang de la
5b8('bum): gnas shing chos gang la yang tshol ba med pa ste/ 'di ni tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la gnas la rten med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dgang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing
6a1('bum): so mar chos gang yang gnas la rtend par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ 'di ni gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
6a2('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing // sems kyang myi 'byung ba sems las byung ba rnams kyang myi rgyu ba ste/ don sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dri ma myed
6a3('bum): pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med pa byed pa ste/ 'di ni dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// 
6a4('bum): de la 'di mtha' yos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ti nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting 'dzin thams cad 'o/ da mtha' yas par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od mtha' yas/ 
6a5('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dren te// de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini dgang nen/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ni ngange 'dzin thams cad kyi'ang byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed
6a6('bum): sa yod/ sa sa na/ yi pa la tha na kyi mas bye la/ da sa
6b1('bum): dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di
6b2('bum): ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la klog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/ 'di ni klog
6b3('bum): gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad shes pa dang / zad mi shes par yang dag par
6b4('bum): rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang nga zhe na/ ting nge 'dzinang de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams
6b5('bum): cad nyin mongs pas 'pham par mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la
6b6('bum): gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gyis 'bar ba ste/ 'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang gang zhe na/ ting nge/ 
6b7('bum): 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi zad mi shes par rjes su mthong nga bas rdul tsam yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de ltar mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
6b8('bum): to// de la mi g.yo ba zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ de ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind myi g.yo myi 'gul rab tu myi byed rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 
7a1('bum): de la 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzinang de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'jig pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'jig pa med pa zhes
7a2('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i byating nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya
7a3('bum): kha'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing rje su ting nge 'dzind thams
7a4('bum): cad mun pa med par byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma myed pa/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad
7a5('bum): la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi gti mugo gi mu na pa dang rab rib kyi mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// 
7a6('bum): de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na// ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsal
7a7('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba byed pa ste
7a8('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
7b1('bum): de la zhid do// des mi shes dpa la nas byab nga po'i na ga shen/ ting nge 'did des gnas sh-i nga de 'dred thams cad kyimi shes dpal yang dag pa ma nga ba ste/ 'dzin mi shes
7b2('bum): dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzid to// de na rjel bu zhes bya ba'i lazhi gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge la nad thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes mi man
7b3('bum): ra khrod du chud par byed pa ste/ 'di rdo rdo rje lte bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sems med pa gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas na sems
7b4('bum): mi g.yo nam par mo g.yo rnam par mi ldog/ yongasu sa yi chad par mi 'gyur nyam su mi bde ba med la/ dril sems zhes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems mi 'byung
7b5('bum): ba ste/ 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dato// de la kun tu snang ba ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thas
7b6('bum): cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di na kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing
7b7('bum): ting nge 'dzind thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind dri
7b8('bum): la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad rin cen mtha' ltar kun nas snang ba ste/ 'di ni rin cen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin
8a1('bum): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad phyag rgya med pa'i thas phyag rgya btab pa nye bar gzung nas phyag rgyas btab par gyu ra pa ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag
8a2('bum): rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa med par yang dag par
8a3('bum): rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind ga de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thos
8a4('bum): cad dang chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba/ spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la chos kyis 'pha gus pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la
8a5('bum): gnas shing chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba dang / ting nge 'ja nad thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin / 
8a6('bum): de la rnam par 'byor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin krung zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rnam par 'khor ba ste/ 'di na rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// des
8a7('bum): chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzinang de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi tshigA rab tu 'byid pa ste/ 'di ni chos thos
8a8('bum): cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da'o// de la yi ge mnyam bur 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'di na de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge sa
8b1('bum): pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge/ 
8b2('bum): 'dzind thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang myigs pa med pa ste/ 'od ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la dmigs pa ga bcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge
8b3('bum): 'dzi nad de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmyigs pa gcod par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi
8b4('bum): gang zhe na ga ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing chos thams cad lagyur pa myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting / 
8b5('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang dmyigs pa med pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la myi
8b6('bum): nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing nges pa'i tshig thams cad yang dag par dmyigasu med cing / tha snyad la ltos pa tsam mo zhes rtog par 'jug pa ste
8b7('bum): 'di ni ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi gnas dmyigs pa ste/ 
8b8('bum): de 'di ni gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i dating nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par bsel ba ste/ 
9a1('bum): 'di ni rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag
9a2('bum): par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad
9a3('bum): kyi g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'od ni g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gar+b+ha
9a4('bum): shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su mi thob pa ste/ 'di ni/ 
9a5('bum): yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyurd pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge nye 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thas
9a6('bum): cad la sems myi 'jug pa ste/ 'do na sems sred por gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dge ba'i bame tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind do la gnas shing ting / 
9a7('bum): 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dge ba'i bame tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang / 
9a8('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa bya ba'i/ 
9b1('bum): ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni spobs pa mtha' us pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes
9b2('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni mi mnya
9b3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind/ gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba
9b4('bum): ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ti dang nge 'dzind to// de la yongasu gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de thams cad dang ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi
9b5('bum): rgyur mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da to// de la nem nur rnam par se lad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nad gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams
9b6('bum): cad dang chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel pA rab tu 'thob pa pa ste/ 'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gcig tu rna
9b7('bum): par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos gang yang gnyis yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rnam
9b8('bum): ba mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa/ mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par rje su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa mngon
10a1('bum): par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la gnas gcig tu gyurd pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dza nad thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par
10a2('bum): rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par 'dor ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thos/ 
10a3('bum): cad gnyis su byed par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
10a4('bum): 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad rtogs par byed po'i ye shes la zhugs nas de la bzhugs pa'i phyir khong du mi chud pa gang yang med pa ste/ 'di ni rtogs
10a5('bum): pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khongs su chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting // nge 'dzind to// de la brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting / nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge
10a6('bum): 'dzin thams cad kyi brda' dang sba la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni brda' dang snre la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi gi dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin/ 
10a7('bum): de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad yi ge dang bral bA zhes bya ba'i rjes su ma mthong ba ste/ 'di sgra dbyangs kyi yi dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang
10a8('bum): zhen ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi gzi brjid pa ltar lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la mtshan nyid yongs su
10b1('bum): sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la
10b2('bum): de la mngon par dmyigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad mngon par dmyigs pa myed par yang dag pa ro rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mngon par
10b3('bum): dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'a/ 
10b4('bum): 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ra ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad ngal mngon par dga' ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na// 
10b5('bum): ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad la bde bdang sdug bsngal yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba ste/ 'di ni bde ba dang sdug sngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa
10b6('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to/ de la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzand de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad zad par rung bar yang dag par rje su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni
10b7('bum): zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la gzungs kyi glo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind te gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing / gzungs thams cad yongs su 'dzind pa ste/ 'di ni
10b8('bum): gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad yang
11a1('bum): dag par dang log par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad/ 
11a2('bum): yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad la dgal ba dang 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa
11a3('bum): thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mthun pa dang
11a4('bum): 'gal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la 'od dri ma mye dad pa zhes bya ba'i ti/ nga nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gan+da
11a5('bum): shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma med zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// dzAl snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge
11a6('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// de la zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin / 
11a7('bum): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad 'di lta ste dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
11a8('bum): to/ de la gdung ba med pa'i klog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris snang bar byas shing / mun pa mun nag smag du 'gyur ba dag gyi
11b1('bum): tsha ba gdung ba sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni gdung ba med pa'i klog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po dang / 
11b2('bum): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rgyan chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin
11b3('bum): thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind tha sa
11b4('bum): cad la 'khrug pa yang myi dmyigs rtse gcig kyang myi dmyags ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzinang mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la
11b5('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind thams cad rdul dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind to// de nyon mongs pa med par yang dag
11b6('bum): gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin de thams cad nyon mongs pa med par gyur pa ste/ da ni nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
11b7('bum): 'dzind to// de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs
11b8('bum): pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa me dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la gnas dmyigs su med
12a1('bum): pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni gnas dmyig su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya
12a2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin
12a3('bum): nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par se lad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi lus
12a4('bum): myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sred pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la ngag gi skyon rna ma dag par 'jig pas na mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na
12a5('bum): ting nge 'dzind de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi ngag gi las myi dmigs ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'ji ga pas na mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la
12a6('bum): namakha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos thams cad na mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos
12a7('bum): med pa 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni namakha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin do// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
12a8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u dgu pa'o// 
12b1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar
12b2('bum): gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byo rang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12b3('bum): chen po nang gi lus la de myi dmyigasar pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam pa rlags
12b4('bum): cing rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam das la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang / 
12b5('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde rnam par gsal cing rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi nang
12b6('bum): gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing
12b7('bum): rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go/ nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lwa zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan
12b8('bum): pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par gsal cing rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi'i tshor ba la de myi dmyigs
13a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten tshigs sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par gsal cing rnam par spyod kyang nor ba dang lda
13a2('bum): pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi nang ga tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pas dang ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems
13a3('bum): dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par myi rtog go/ nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta ba zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran
13a4('bum): pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi/ bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod dkyang chags sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// phyi'i sems la de myi dmyigs pa
13a5('bum): tshul gis sems kyi rjes su la zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang / ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags drang yid mi bde ba rnam par bas la cing rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan po'i rnam par rtog pa rnams lan
13a6('bum): par mi rtog go// phyi nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sem sa kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod
13a7('bum): kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go// nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chagaso
13a8('bum): sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go/ phyi'i chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin
13b1('bum): dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par ba rtog pa rnas las rnam par myi rtog go// phyi nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i
13b2('bum): tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi tshogs sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rdza
13b3('bum): par mi rtog go// rab 'byorade ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal ba chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro
13b4('bum): 'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'greng na 'grang ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// de'i lus nyams bde ba
13b5('bum): 'am nyams myi bde ba yang rung ste/ ji lnga ji ltar gnas pa de lta de ltar des rab tu shes te/ rab 'byorang de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
13b6('bum): lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sas// 
13b7('bum): dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta ning brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mimyi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod de/ de 'gro 'am 'ong ba yang / 
13b8('bum): shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ lta 'am rnam par lta yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum 'am rkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ skar ma dang ldum zeng 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ zos pa dang 'chos pa dang / 
14a1('bum): 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin
14a2('bum): mthungs pa dang myangs pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin kha/ nyal ba dang gnyid kyi ma myong bsal bral yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'greng ba dang 'dug pa lo yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 
14a3('bum): gnyid kyis log pa 'ams log pa ra yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ smra ba dang mi smra ba na mang gos bzhin du skyed pa yin/ nang du yang dag par log pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/ dzina'i'abyor
14a4('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang nang gi lus la de myed myigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lha zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang
14a5('bum): ldan pa dra ba dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi nags sems dang sid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod // rab ba de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs
14a6('bum): rab kyi pha ro lang tu byind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa zhing dbugs nang du rgyun yang dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes byabar rab tu shes so// dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyun yang dran 'di/ 
14a7('bum): dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so dbugs nang du ring du rgyun yang dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o// zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na yang dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// 
14a8('bum): dbugs zung du dang du rgyun yang dbugs nang du byung du rgyu'o zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// dbugs phyir/ thung du rgyun/ yang dbugs phyir thung du rgya'i zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byo ring 'di lta ste dper na
14a9('bum): 'ang ba'i 'khor lo bzlar ba ma 'khor ba'i ser la bskor ba'i mar bu mkhas pa na maung dra slar ring du bskor ro/ zhes byo ba na tu zhes so// lung du sar nabung du bgangar ro zhes bya ba rab tu sa / 
14b1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran par dbugs nang du rgyus na yang dran par nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dran par/ 
14b2('bum): dbugs phyir rgyus na yang dran par dbugs phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs ring du nang du rgyus na yang dbugs nang du ring du rgyas so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs ring du phyir rgyus na yang dbug
14b3('bum): phyir ring du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ dbugs nang du thung du rgyus na yang dbugs thung ngu nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ dbugs thung ngu phyir rgyus na yang dbugs thung ngu phyir rgyas so zhes bya bar
14b4('bum): rab tu shes so// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / 
14b5('bum): brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'dzi/ ga rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal/ cing rnam par bsol cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzha
14b6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod
14b7('bum): zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu rtogs te/ rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na ba lang gi shan pa 'am ba lang gi shan pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po thogs ste/ ba lang bas
14b8('bum): cing bag pa ni phye bshags te de ltar so sor phye nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i spyod pa tshe/ lus
15a1('bum): 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do// chu'i khams dang mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do// zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs te// rab 'byon
15a2('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing 'greng ngam 'dug te/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjesu lta zhing brtson 'grusocani
15a3('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyi
15a4('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad skra dang grad pa man chad du sen mo dang spu dang pags pa yan chad du myi rtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
15a5('bum): du rtogs ste lus 'di la skra dang spu dang sen mo dang / pag/ sa pa dang / klad pa dang / sha dang chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus / pa dang / rkang dang snying dang / mkhal ma dang mchin pa dang / 
15a6('bum): glo ba dang mcher pa dang / long ka dang rgyu ma dang ga nyam dang / nang grolnga dang gcin dang phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang rdal dang / tshil dang sde bos dang ngar snabs dang rnag dang ga 'khrigs pa dang bad kan dang / 
15a7('bum): chu ser dang kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klag pa dang / klang rgyas dang rdum dang rna skabs kyang yod do// zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs te/ rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na/ chun pa'i skye
15a8('bum): snod la dang yungs dang / sra chung dang bal sran dang / nas dang gro dang 'bras dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba myig dang ldan pa'i myi zhig gis phye ste bltas na 'di ni mi lo// 'di ni yungs kar ro// 'don
15b1('bum): sran chung ngo // 'di ni bal sman no// 'di ni nis so// 'di ni gri'o// 'di ni 'bras so// 'dir dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses/ 
15b2('bum): dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad sna dang spri 'o man chad sen mo dang / spu dang pags pa yan chad du mi rtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs te/ lus
15b3('bum): 'di la skra dang spu dang sen mo dang pags pa dang / klag pa dang ra shaM dang chu ba dang khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang snying dang mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mcher pa dang / ling ka dang / rgyu ma dang / 
15b4('bum): gnye ma dang nang grol dang / gcin dang phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang rdul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang ngar snabs dang / rnag dang mkhrigs pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri
15b5('bum): ma dang / klad pa dang / klang rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna skabs dag kyang yod do// zhes bya bar rab tu rtog go// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong
15b6('bum): phrag brgya / bram tho// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi daphyogs
15b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsol cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byorang
15b8('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dur khrod du bor ba'i ro'i mal du bsnyal ba shi nas
16a1('bum): zhag gcig lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gsum lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag lnga lon pa 'am/ rnam par bam pa 'am/ rnam par sngos pa dang / 
16a2('bum): rnam par rnags pa 'am/ rnam par zos pa 'am/ rnam par 'thor ba mthong na/ de'i lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos 'di nyid las
16a3('bum): ma 'das pa'o// zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus
16a4('bum): kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ljon pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi tshigs sems dang yid myi bde ba rna rnam par bsal ning rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang
16a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro shi nas zhag drug lon pa 'am/ sho nas zhag bdun lon pa bya rog gam/ 
16a6('bum): khwa 'am/ 'ol ba 'am bya rgod dam/ spyad kyi 'am wa'am khyi 'am/ ngo ma yin pa'i srog tshogs kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong na/ de dri'i lus 'di yang tshul de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang de lta bu'i chos can
16a7('bum): de lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid de lta bu las ma 'das so// zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ phyi'i la
16a8('bum): la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor/ 
16b1('bum): ga zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa myi gtsang ba rnags pa srungs pa mthong ba de'i tshe lus 'di nyid
16b2('bum): kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe me/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rje su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sos
16b4('bum): dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor grazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus / 
16b5('bum): ra ri dang \u0f7fkhrag wAr ri chags pa/ rgyus bras brang brang du 'brel da// pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can
16b6('bum): te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o// zhes bya bar nye bar rti ga go// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus
16b7('bum): la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor/ 
16b8('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam du re khrod kyi rus pa keng rus dang / khrag med pa rgyus pa'i gzungs med pa/ dung gi mdog ltar gyurapa
17a1('bum): pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o// zhes bya bar
17a2('bum): nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta
17a3('bum): zhing brtson 'grus can shos bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do// rab 'byorarang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal
17a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus gzungs myed par gyes pa dung gyi mdog ltar gyurd pa/ sa lnga rnam par
17a5('bum): 'thor ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de'i lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus de yang 'di lta bu'i chosacan 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las
17a6('bum): ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de ma dmyigs pa'i
17a7('bum): tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chagasas dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor
17a8('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa sa la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'grom
17b1('bum): ba rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ byinang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor / dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ tshigs
17b2('bum): pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thorang/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'tho rang / 'jing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thorang/ mgo'i rus pa rnams pa kyang gzhan du 'thor da kha mtha
17b3('bum): na de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos ni 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'o// zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ rab 'byor nga de
17b4('bum): wAr rna byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lu sa la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rje su lta zhing brtson
17b5('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pa sa 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam parabasal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub
17b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo ma lon pa rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa dung go ma dog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i cha
17b7('bum): de lus 'di nyid kyang de dang tshul nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor
17b8('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin
18a1('bum): dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
18a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa rab rib snang ba sngon por gyur pa thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa zegs pa brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'dran 'dren du gyur pa mthong ba de'i
18a3('bum): tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi lha yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o// zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar
18a4('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang / 
18a5('bum): ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rna/ ma par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyi/ gas pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rje su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shwe
18a6('bum): bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brdzun/ 
18a7('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rje/ 
18a8('bum): su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spod do// phyi'i tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
18b1('bum): tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs
18b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par rabs lo cing rnam par spyod do// nang go sems
18b3('bum): la de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta ba zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spod ngo // 
18b4('bum): phyi'i sems de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su da lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags rma dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal/ 
18b5('bum): cing rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can sha/ sa bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags
18b6('bum): sems dang yod myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig
18b7('bum): rten gi chags sems dang yid ma bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi'i chos la de mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas
18b8('bum): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor nga 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor nga gnan yang byang chub
18b9('bum): phyin gi tshus la de myir dmyig pa'i tshul gis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sos dang yid mi bde ba rna pa ses pa ring na par spyod de/ 
19a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
19a2('bum): swa spyong pa'i tshe/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chosu ma skyes pa rnams kyi myi bskyed pa'i phyir de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo// 'don 'grus rtsos mo sems kyi mthu bskyed do// yang dag par smon lam
19a3('bum): 'debabs so// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing brtson 'grus brtsom mo sems kyi mthu bskyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debaso// dge ba'i
19a4('bum): chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyod pa'i phyir de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi nas mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sem ngas kyi mthu bskyed do// yang dag par smon las 'debs so// dge ba'i chos
19a5('bum): skyed pa rnams gnas pa dang phyir ning skom pa dang nyams par 'gyur ba dang yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de mi dmig sa pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo brtson 'grus brtsom mo// 
19a6('bum): sems kyi mthu bskyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs te/ rab 'byor nga 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
19a7('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mos pa
19a8('bum): rje 'dzi spong ba'i 'du byed dang man pa'i rji chus kyi na pa na pas gnas pa/ 'dod gas de bral pa lo gnas pa 'dog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yang su chub pa rnam ma btsun 'dus kyi
19b1('bum): ti nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spyong ba'i yongs su grub pa bsgom mo// sems kyi
19b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin spyong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral bra la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par sbyong bas yongasu grub pa sgom/ dpyod pa'i ting
19b3('bum): 'dzind spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de mi
19b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste/ 
19b5('bum): lnga gang zhe na dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang podang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po pa nga / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor de 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i
19b6('bum): tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byo rang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di 'di ltar stobs lnga ste/ lnga
19b7('bum): gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi/ stobs ste/ rab 'byor drag 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
19b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yon lag 'dun te 'dun
20a1('bum): gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag zung chub kyi yan lag dang du dag ba ya / 
20a2('bum): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzind yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// / 
20a3('bum): de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa yang dag byang chub
20a4('bum): kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa la gnas 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub ce pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed do// de
20a5('bum): la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang na na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shing so rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
20a6('bum): chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongasu grub pa de myi
20a7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byorang de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
20a8('bum): spyod pa'ichi/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongasasu grub pu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
20b1('bum): gyis sgom par byed do/ de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhen/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa rjen thogs rab kyi sa nos tu phyi pa sa spyong nga na/ dga' ba yang nga/ 
20b2('bum): byang chub kyis nal ga ngan pa la gnas pa 'dod rtags dang bral la gnas pa 'gag pa la gnas pa rnam par song bas yongs su grub par myi dmyigs pa'i nus gyis ky-i gam pa gyid ngo // de la shin tu spangs pa ya
20b3('bum): dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la da spyod pa'i tshe/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan ldan
20b4('bum): dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa te la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myed myirdzogs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed do// de la ting nge 'dzidzi
20b5('bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag zhen/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa lag n+d+ha
20b6('bum): pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongasu grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed do// de la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhen rkye/ 
20b7('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa rgya 'gog po
20b8('bum): la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// rab 'byor nga 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor dgazhan yang byang chub
21a1('bum): sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i khyis pa chen po ni 'di sa gas pa'i lham yan lag brgyad bskye/ 'phags pa'i lam ldan lag brjod parnyen yang dag pa'i lha bu dang yang dag / 
21a2('bum): rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzizhin te/ de la yang dag pa
21a3('bum): lnga ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dil byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chi/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas
21a4('bum): pa 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongasu grub pa de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa
21a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong
21a6('bum): bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i tshe/ 
21a7('bum): yang dag pa'i ngag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed do// yang
21a8('bum): dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dben pa la gnas pa/ 
21b1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la bya
21b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas
21b3('bum): rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
21b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba la dben pa la gan nges pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa lo gan sro pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
21b5('bum): gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byorang// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dben
21b6('bum): pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gnas pa/ 'gog pa la ga nas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
21b7('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spo/ 
21b8('bum): khas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed de/ rab 'byorang 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
22a1('bum): blo'i thig pa chen po ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ti dri 'dzind dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa myeng ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 
22a2('bum): de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
22a3('bum): bya'o// de la mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan sra med pa'i ting
22a4('bum): 'dzind ces bya'o// de la smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag nga zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba myed do// zhes/ mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa smon/ 
22a5('bum): khro myed pa'i rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo ste/ 'di dag ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgorade dag la zhum pa myed par dran par bya ste/ rab 'byo rang 'di yod de/ 
22a6('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar ye shes bcu
22a7('bum): gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mya skye ba myed pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjesu
22a8('bum): rtog pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal myi skye bar shes pa'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na
22b1('bum): kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// de la zad pa
22b2('bum): shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad par shes pa'o// de la myi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud skyed pa myed par shes pa'o// de la chos shes pa gang zhen/ daphung po lnga rgyu mar yod/ 
22b3('bum): su rtogs shing shes pa'o// de la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ myig myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba myi rtag pa ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce myi rtag ces
22b4('bum): bye bar shes pa dang / lus myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs myi rtag ces/ bya bar shes pa dang / sgra myi rtag ces bya bar rje shes pa dang / 
22b5('bum): dri myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos myi rtag ce sa bya bar shes pa dang / myig gi khas mi rtag ces bya
22b6('bum): par shes pa dang / gzugs kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra
22b7('bum): khrims myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i rno bar shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang sgra
22b8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dag/ 
23a1('bum): ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg bya'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes
23a2('bum): ba dang / yid kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sa'i khams myi rtog ces bya
23a3('bum): par shes pa dang / chu'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mye'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / na mkha'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa
23a4('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa / dang / ma rig pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar / 
23a5('bum): pa dang / mying dang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skyemached drug mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg pa myi dag ces bya bar shes pa dang / tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / 
23a6('bum): skyed pa myo rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / len pa myi nag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sprid pa myi ga ces bya bar shes pa dang / stob sbyi na ga ces bya bar gos pa dang / na shi mri rtag ces bya bar shes s+ho// de 'thun
23a7('bum): rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gi sems sems kyis shes pa'o// de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gis lam shes pa dang / yongasasu byung ba shes pa'o// de la sgra ji ba nI/ 
23a8('bum): shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 'i ye shes te/ rab 'byor 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab byo
23b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya 'og zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongasu shes pa'i dbang
23b2('bum): po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyu rad pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi
23b3('bum): bdabang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongasu snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su
23b4('bum): shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa yongs su shesadapar ma gyu rad pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus da kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang / 
23b5('bum): shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po ga nga zhe na/ gang zag myi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang / 
23b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor
23b7('bum): 'di ni yong su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems
23b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang byas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzinang dang rtog pa myed la spyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin
24a1('bum): dang / rtog pa myed cing spyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa dang bcas pa pyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod
24a2('bum): las dben sdig do mya dge ba'i chos kyis dongon pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan deng ba la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni dag pa dang bcas shing dpyod bu dang
24a3('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te/ 'di ni rtog pa myed la spyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// de la
24a4('bum): rtog pa cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzinang gang zhe na/ bsam pa/ tan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam pa/ datan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par/ 
24a5('bum): 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par/ 'jug pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes mi ni skye mched kyi snyoms
24a6('bum): par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// 'di ni mi rtog myi spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' se so
