48a4('bum): pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyi nga myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni reg stong pa nyi da 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed
48a5('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos stong pa nyid 'byugyu nga bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga gzug sa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa
48a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sgra stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// dri stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas
48a7('bum): 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// ro stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// reg stong pa
48a8('bum): nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed dro/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa/ 
48b1('bum): nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byord de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sgra sgras stong pa'i phyir ro// dri dris stong pa'i phyir ro// ro ras stong pa'i phyir ro// reg reg kyis
48b2('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro// chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang man
48b3('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod tu zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i cho rjerdzas rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes
48b4('bum): pastong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang ma tshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod tu zad do// rab 'byor gang ma nyid
48b5('bum): myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus kyi rnam par/ shes pa stong pa nyid 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorarang gang mtsha/ na nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid kyi rnam
48b6('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nos 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
48b7('bum): du gnas pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsu
48b8('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myedado/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rna ba thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lus
49a1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas
49a2('bum): 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byo radang de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa myig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i rnam par she
49a3('bum): bla rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas spong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi rnam par
49a4('bum): shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyi/ ra ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
49a5('bum): 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung b.ra'adod du zad do// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid med pa'i rlo sa rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
49a6('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad de/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna'i 'dus te rig pa stong ba 'od 'byung bar 'dong du zad do/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i
49a7('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lho'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dong du bang // rab 'byor dgang ma tshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dong ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa snyed pa'i
49a8('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du 'dod zad de/ rab 'byor nga gong mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod po de ni yid kyi 'dus te rog pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad de/ de ci'i phyir na na/ rab 'byor
49b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsu nas 'byung ba myed do// 
49b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed de/ lce'i 'dus te
49b3('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa sa
49b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gnasum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci
49b5('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i 'dus te reg
49b6('bum): ba sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi 'dus
49b7('bum): te reg par yid kyi 'dus te rigs stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba ra 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod
49b8('bum): du zad da/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myong ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod po de ni rnaH pa'i 'dus te rig pa ni rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan
50a1('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshor stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
50a2('bum): pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'dod du zed do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
50a3('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
50a4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nga nyid du gnas pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
50a5('bum): ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sna'i ladus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
50a6('bum): sa seM nga rnas pa sams padas ston pa bye du smranas bsru du/ lce'i sa ga pa'i rkyen kyis kyi nga pa nyid ni khams gsus smra rgyu ba byed do/ rnam pa zlas sbya da
50a7('bum): nyid du gnas pa myed do/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bstong pa nyid mi khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cadas khyenang pa nyid du gnas pa myed nga/ yid kyi 'dus na
50a8('bum): rgyam gyi tshor po dang pa nyid ni 'anas gdus nas nga babyed // rnam pa thams pa ma byed pa ti dru gnas pa rgyad / rab khyo kyi phyir ded/ 'di ltar phyog gi tshus cig
50b1('bum): kyis tshor ba myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas song ba'i phyir ro/ rna ba dris de reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bzla ba'i 'dus te gu ba'i rkyend kyis tshor byas song ba'i phyir ro/ sna'i 'dus te / 
50b2('bum): ba sprin kyis tshur ba sdu 'dris te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cor bas spyod pa'i phyir ro// lce'i 'dus te rog pa'i sbyin kyis ni rab kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas spong po'i phyir / lus
50b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lus kyi dus de rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stod pa'i phyir ro/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor na med kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshong ngos spong ba'i phyir ro// 
50b4('bum): ra kyang dgang brtson nyid med pa'i phyir chos rnams 'byung ba rla 'dod pa de ni rmyi lus 'thung bar 'dod du dad / rab byor dgang mtshan nyid med pa'i chom rnams 'byung bar 'dod ba'ini
50b5('bum): ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myeng pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni smig rgyu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
50b6('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni sgra brnyan 'byung bar 'dod du zad / rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni myig g.yor 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos
50b7('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa dro ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga myi lam ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mo khye nad pa nyid du
50b8('bum): gnas pa myed do/ sgyu ma ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ smrigs rgyu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ 
51a1('bum): gnas pa myed do// sgra brnyan ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// myig g.yor ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// 
51a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spru lad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byorang
51a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni rmyi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir/ sgyu ma ni sgyu mas stong pa'i phyir ro// smig rgyu ni smig rgyus stong pa'i phyir ro// sgra brnyan ni sgra brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
51a4('bum): myig g.yor ni myig g.yor gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dede bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i
51a5('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'did du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshul khrims kyi
51a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang ma
51a7('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan gyi
51a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorarang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
51b1('bum): 'byorang sbyin pa'i pha rol pa tu phyinang pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas/ 
51b2('bum): 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gan/ 
51b3('bum): ba myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha ro rje lang tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rolang du phyin pa'i
51b4('bum): ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
51b5('bum): ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byord de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sI na pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sbyin pa'i phyind pa'i ngos
51b6('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis smong ba'i phyir ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i ngo bo nyid ni
51b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam
51b8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nga ba nyid ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo
52a1('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'bru
52a2('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zang ngo // rab 'byorang gong mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed
52a3('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zod// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab
52a4('bum): 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ngan ma pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byo darang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
52a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni'o// dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor// 
52a6('bum): ga mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni thog ma dang tha myed
52a7('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du meng // rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zangango // rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
52a8('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dbazhin stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zang ngo // rab 'byorang gang mnan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da/ 
52b1('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zang ngo // rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni myi mye gas pa
52b2('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor du gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i rje
52b3('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'o byung bar/ 
52b4('bum): 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ phyi stong pa nyid ni khas
52b5('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenadapa nyid du gnas pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni khams ga/ sum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
52b6('bum): gnas pa myed do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// 
52b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni khams
52b8('bum): gsum nas 'byung bar myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyi nad pa nyid du gnas pa
53a1('bum): myed do mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
53a2('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba skyed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 
53a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams
53a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa nga thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// myi dmyigs/ 
53a5('bum): bstong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam
53a6('bum): bA bams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba mying ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du gnas pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po
53a7('bum): nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med rdo// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhon/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis spyong pa'i phyir ro/ 
53a8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis
53b1('bum): stong ba'i phyir ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa phyir ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir/ 
53b2('bum): ro/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dor ba myed
53b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
53b4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// myi dmyig sa pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i
53b5('bum): phyir ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa 'i phyir ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po rmisad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang / 
53b6('bum): mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod ba zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod ba de ni yang dag par spong
53b7('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'thung bar 'dod pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos
53b8('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dbang po rnams 'byung bar 'dong du zang ngo // rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed po'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni slebs/ 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang ma rgya
54a1('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'phag pa'i la
54a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhen rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa/ 
54a3('bum): myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nus 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsu
54a4('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byu nga bo myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 
54a5('bum): stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan pa lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas/ 
54a6('bum): 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag byu rgyad pa'ing ba nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed du/ rnam pa thams cad
54a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa skyed do/ rab 'byo nga depo'i phyi zhe na/ 'dri ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi na nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yang dag lnga
54a8('bum): spong rnams kyi de bo nyid ni yong dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ dbang po rje
54b1('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
54b2('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos
54b3('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung dang par 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan rnams 'byung bar
54b4('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnaMs 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshad myed pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod te/ du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams
54b5('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
54b6('bum): pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myeng ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad ngo / rab 'byos
54b7('bum): gangam nan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtshan myi myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni smin pa myed pa 'byung bar 'dod pad/ 
54b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni
54b9('bum): su chud do// rab 'byor mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnaMs 'byung bar 'dod pa
55a1('bum): khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad
55a2('bum): ma khye nang pa nyid du gnas pa myed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par du 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams bcad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 
55a3('bum): rnapar tha rad pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khas/ 
55a4('bum): bsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
55a5('bum): pamyed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'a/ byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnasapa myed do// smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas
55a6('bum): 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i badren pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
55a7('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis song ba'i phyir no/ chad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni tshang med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ 
55a8('bum): gzugs sred pa'i snyoms par lus pa rnams kyi po doni gzugs myed pa'i sems par 'jus rnam sa kying banyid kyis spang pa'i byor ro// rnam por ba pa rnams kying bo nyid ni rnam pa
55b1('bum): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
55b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni smon pa myong ba'i
55b3('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed
55b4('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ting nge 'dzind rnamasa'abyung bar 'dod du zad // rab 'byo rlung gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo
55b5('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab la byo rang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ 
55b6('bum): pa myed de/ ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum
55b7('bum): naso 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni mngon par shes pa rnams
55b8('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
56a1('bum): da kyis snod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zud do/ rab 'byor
56a2('bum): gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dong du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa ro ni so so yang dag
56a3('bum): ber rig pa bzhi 'o byung bar 'dod du zad do/ rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres blo brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir
56a4('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed rdo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// myi 'jig
56a5('bum): pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sro so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khas gsum
56a6('bum): 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
56a7('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin ga shegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
56a8('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni myi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
56b1('bum): phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor/ nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa/ 
56b2('bum): de ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang ma tshan
56b3('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'i dgra/ 
56b4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga dgra bcom pa za ga pa zad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni kham sa gsum nas 'byung ba myed // 
56b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myedado// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// byang
56b6('bum): chub sems dra pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas la byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
56b7('bum): rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
56b8('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi de nyid ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa
57a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras// 
57a2('bum): bu 'byung bar 'dod tu zod do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos
57a3('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab
57a4('bum): 'byorard gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang byang chub 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtsha na nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lam gyi
57a5('bum): rnam pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan/ nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyend pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe
57a6('bum): ni/ rab 'byor nga rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas re byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khas gsum nas 'byung / 
57a7('bum): ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// dgra bcom pa
57a8('bum): da ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rang byang chub ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa
57b1('bum): myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni khams gsum nas/ 'byung ba myed do// 
57b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
57b3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bya sa bu'i ngo bo nyid de ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
57b4('bum): pa'i phyir ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyidakyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid nar byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lam gyi rnam
57b5('bum): bshes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong pa'i/ phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
57b6('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mying 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
57b7('bum): gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni brda 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnaMs 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
57b8('bum): gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mying stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams
58a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
58a2('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// gradags pa stong pa nyid
58a3('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying stong pa nyid ni mying stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
58a4('bum): mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brda stong pa nyid ni brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyisastong pa'i phyir ro// tha snyad stong pa nyid ni tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo
58a5('bum): bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gdags pa stong pa nyid ni gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni skye
58a6('bum): bamyed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnaMs 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'gag pa 'gag pa myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos
58a7('bum): rnamos 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam par byang ba myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// 
58a8('bum): ras myo gang bcan nyid byed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mngon par 'du bya ba myod par 'byung bar song du zang do// de ci'i phyir nen/ rab 'byor nga skye bskyed pa'i nga nyid ni khams gsum
58b1('bum): 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 'gag pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// kun nas nyon
58b2('bum): mongs pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rnam par byang ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// 
58b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir/ 
58b4('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni skye ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gag pa myed pa ni 'gag pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa ni kun nas nyon
58b5('bum): mongs pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam parabyang ba myed pa ni rnam par byang ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa ni mngon par du bya/ 
58b6('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de de ltar rnam grangs 'dis na 'di ltar theg pa chen po de ni khams gsum nas 'byung nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas par shes par
58b7('bum): bya ste/ gnas de ni skyong du myed pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa ni theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// de ci
58b8('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad myi gnas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro myi gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de ni myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na/ 
59a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yin no// rab 'byor nga dri lta ste dper
59a2('bum): na/ de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di
59a3('bum): lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di
59a4('bum): lta ste dper na/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gan te sa pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byo/ rang de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi
59a5('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi ga nas pa myed do// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ 
59a6('bum): myi gnas pa myed do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir
59a7('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo 'du stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi/ 
59a8('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas
59b1('bum): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings ni gnas/ 
59b2('bum): pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na/ rab tu byung ba'i dbyings ni
59b3('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dod chags
59b4('bum): dang bral ba'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po// de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
59b5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ 
59b6('bum): myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa 'amyed do// 'dod chags zang ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gam
59b7('bum): pa myed do// rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do/ 'dod chags dang / bral ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// 'gog
59b8('bum): pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/ gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar/ na mkha'i dbyings na mkha'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dod
60a1('bum): chags zad pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab tu byang ba'i dbyings rab tu byung ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyis
60a2('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ba'i phyir ro// 'gog pa'i dbyings 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa stong phrag brgya ba/ bam gro
60a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor
60a4('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myig/ nas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa che/ na po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 8
60a5('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'du shes stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// / 
60a6('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 'du byed stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di
60a7('bum): lta ste dper na/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir/ 
60a8('bum): zhen/ rab 'byor da gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am myi gnas pa myed do// tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am myi gnas pa myed do// 
60b1('bum): 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
60b2('bum): tshor ba tsher bas stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ myig
60b3('bum): stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ rna ba stong
60b4('bum): pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab la dbyor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yi// rten myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lnga ste dper na sna stong
60b5('bum): pa nyid ni gnas yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'a byo de bzhi du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ lci stong / 
60b6('bum): pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ lus stong pa nyid ni gan+da
60b7('bum): pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yid stong pa nyid ni gnas
60b8('bum): pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa
61a1('bum): yang myed do// rna ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// sna'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// lce'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// 
61a2('bum): lus kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// yid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gams pa 'am myi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe no// rab 'byor de 'di ltar myig myig gis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
61a3('bum): rna ba rna bas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna snas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce lces stong pa'i phyir ro// lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs
61a4('bum): stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorarang 'di lta
61a5('bum): ste dper na/ sgra stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gan sa pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
61a6('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ dri stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin// 
61a7('bum): rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ro stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor du de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ 
61a8('bum): rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na/ reg stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yA ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yino// 
61b1('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ chos stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yi/ 
61b2('bum): no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo rang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'o ma myi gnas pa myed do// sgra'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// dri'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi ga
61b3('bum): pa myed do// ro'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// reg gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
61b4('bum): rab 'byord de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyi ro sgra sgras stong pa'i phyir ro// dri dris stong pa'i phyir ro// ro ros srong pa'i phyir ro// reg reg gis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos chos
61b5('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ myi ga gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
61b6('bum): chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni gnas po yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du
61b7('bum): theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang maHyin no// rab
61b8('bum): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gan
62a1('bum): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byoraradang de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
62a2('bum): ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ yid kyi rnam par
62a3('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi/ gnas pa pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
62a4('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myiganas pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni grwa/ nas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
62a5('bum): ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ 
62a6('bum): myi gnas pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa myig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir/ 
62a7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stod pa'i phyir ro// lus
62a8('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid ni/ 
62b1('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorard de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
62b2('bum): ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorar de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sna'i dus te reg pa'i stong pa
62b3('bum): nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorar de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yino// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
62b4('bum): stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na/ 
62b5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa che/ na po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no//

64b1('bum): myi gnas pa myed do// smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid lnga ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// sgra brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// myig yor gyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi
64b2('bum): gnas pa myed do// gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'ango bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na

64b4('bum): yor myig yir gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzugs bran na ga gas brnyan gyis stong po'i phyir ro/ de bzhin she gas pa'i sprul pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong po'i

66b6('bum): myi gnas pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid

66b8('bum): gnas pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa myed do// thog ma dang tha mo myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gan pa myed/ 
67a1('bum): dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid kyi banyidi la ni gnas pa'am myi gnas ba myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bring ba nyi la ni gnas pa'am myi gnas pa myed do// chos thams cang spyod pa nyid kyi na

67a4('bum): myi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyistong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid

67a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis kyi stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i

67a8('bum): po stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad stong po nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'o// 
67b1('bum): phyir ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed
67b2('bum): kha stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta/ 
67b3('bum): ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du thegs pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma
