102a4('bum): rolang du phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga tshul
102a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa ma/ na po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtenang / zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar yin no// rab 'byor dgal te
102a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa me yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du brtses pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
102a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po myed yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin pa'i 'jig rten zi lad gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
102a8('bum): dngos yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos pol po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi sa
102b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig de nang zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor nga gal te bsam brtan gyi pha rol
102b2('bum): tu phyind pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor du gsam
102b3('bum): brtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po med pa la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te shes
102b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myong rapa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 
102b5('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma yin pas rdo 'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du ba sa pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor
102b6('bum): gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yim du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ma myong / 
102b7('bum): nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zilang gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos
102b8('bum): po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zilang gis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga phyi stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa
103a1('bum): chen po 'dis dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal de phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa
103a2('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
103a3('bum): dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zi lad kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
103a4('bum): 'dis lha dang myi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan cing 'byung por mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa zhing dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa
103a5('bum): po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zilang gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te chen po/ stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma
103a6('bum): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dri mang gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor theg pa chen po stong pa nying dngos po med lo das
103a7('bum): ma sa/ sa sa smrasmras pa du/ sa nas pa / ra gyu pa ma sa ni rdum pa
103a8('bum): yi ngom pa med pa ma yin nani theg pa chen pa ngas kya rje mi dang sa ma yin du tsam po'i 'jig rten kyil gyis mnan te 'byung po mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor ngan dam pa spong ba ni
103b1('bum): bzhig yin te/ rnam pa med su ma yinan no/ theg pa chen po las kyang sa dang mi nga ma yi dusas pa'i 'jis ma kyis pa ma kyim da pa
103b2('bum): mdangs po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'das lnga dang mi dang l+h+wa m+b+ha yin du bcas pa'i na/ rten pam gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// ga me jus ma ng+yas stong pa nyid ngos kyi yong / 
103b3('bum): yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha drang mI dang / lA mA yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dri yang gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byorang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nga
103b4('bum): po myeng la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyi theg pa chen po sa ldan mi ngab rna ma yin du cis pa'i 'jig nan mas rgyas mama'abyung ba mngon/ rab 'byong ga yi mthor lam 'as
103b5('bum): da rjem pa 'ang dag yid do/ sa pa yong la skyesmras/ sa patsun po'i sa ya las na stu nas ma nga
103b6('bum): ma las las pa stong pa'i dngos po myed la rjes pa ma yin pas/ rang byu ga pa chen po 'as pa dang mi ngasu ma yin du mas pa'i 'jig nyin rjel kyis man kyang
103b7('bum): ga pa ma ma/ mas mas das sa mam du ma pa'i ma
104a1('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zilang
104a2('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
104a3('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gri/

104a5('bum): kyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur tote/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong ni nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa na/ na po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil ni
104a6('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gamed chos thams cad stong pa'i dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ ngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'dzin
104a7('bum): na ris gyis mnan cang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos thams cang sna pa nyi ngos po myed la ngos po ma yin pas nga'i phyir theg pa chen po 'das lnga dang mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
104a8('bum): ril gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas ni/ 
104b1('bum): 'jig rtenang ri lang gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rang gyi mnan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lnga dang mi dang / lha ma yin
104b2('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rtenang bi la gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor nga gal te mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang /

104b4('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zi la gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te dngos po myong bsngo ba nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ ngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
104b5('bum): lha dang mo dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis man/ na cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur to// rab 'byor dadangos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas de'i
104b6('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig ni nang pa yid gyis minan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgas de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma
104b7('bum): na ni/ theg pa chen po 'ongs kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zi lad gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i
104b8('bum): ni/ zag pa chen pa sa pa mi nga / sa ma yin du bces pa'i jig da duming kyis mnan cing 'drung ba yin/ khyo ga tu brim pa med par rgya ba byung shid rnam pa yang sa nag yi no / 
105a1('bum): dngos po ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zilang gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i
105a2('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zi la gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te dran pa
105a3('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyu

105a5('bum): pa yin no// rab 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams da ngos po yod pa zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa na po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten /

105a8('bum): na jig na kyis kyis mnan pang 'byung ba mi gyu te/ sa khyong du nus byin pa rnams pas po myong la rnam pa ma yin pas/ der phyi theg pa can pa 'das spong mo sa me yin du chen
105b1('bum): 'jig rten pa lang kyis man na cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dbang po rnams dngos po med pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lA ma yin du nas/

105b7('bum): ma yin du lus pa'i rig ts+tsha ya dkyis pan cing byu ba yanan/ ba 'byo gom kyilas dngos po meng po nig yo ma ma 'i skye tso mo tshan nini/ zag pa rjor po sa lnga dang mi dang sngam
106a1('bum): 'jig rten zilang gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang

106a6('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da tsha da med pa rnams dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lnga/ 
106a7('bum): yin du btsas pa'i 'jig rte na 'i mi gyis man cing 'byung ba yinano// rab 'byor gA la gzug sa myed pa'i snyoms pa 'gru pa rnams pos po song ky-i/ yin te/ rdos pa meng pa yin nam/ theg
106a8('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir the/

106b2('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de rnam par thard pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa ni/

106b5('bum): dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po chen/ po 'dis lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyi sa mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par thar pa'i
106b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild gyis mnan cing 'byung
106b7('bum): myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas/

107a1('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byorang mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'di/
