153a3('bum): pa'adi la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmyigs par 'gyur ba la ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba ni da ltar byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir na na/ stong pa nyid la da lngar byung ba'i tshor ba'i// 
153a4('bum): dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong / sa dmyigs su myed ni stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmyig rangs par 'gyur ba lta zhig smos/ rab 'byor da da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes
153a5('bum): ni de ltar byung ba'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs su myed de/ stong nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na stong pa nyid la dal
153a6('bum): byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'byed dmyigs su myed de/ 
153a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis song pas dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lnga ni zhig smos/ rab 'byor dadaltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par nas
153a8('bum): pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen/ spong pa nyid la da lngar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed do/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis spong bas dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la daltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa cu
153b1('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar/ 
153b2('bum): myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus su myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus
153b3('bum): dmyigs pa mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs par
153b4('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ 
153b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi/ pha rol tu phyind pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs te/ 
153b6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs ma nyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid
153b7('bum): kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i sa myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig
153b8('bum): smos/ rab 'byor de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs
154a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sa sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmigs
154a2('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi mi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs
154a3('bum): ba lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta 'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i
154a4('bum): mthar myidamyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nr-i da lngar byung bar myi dmyigs brtson 'grus kyi pha ro long tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ daci'i phyir nan
154a5('bum): rab 'byor da mnyam nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam
154a6('bum): pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs ba lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ji zhig smos/ 8
154a7('bum): 'byord bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni da ltar byung bar mi
154a8('bum): dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
154b1('bum): dus dmig pa lnga ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus myigs pa lnga ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' myi byin
154b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa 'di la 'das pa'i dus myi
154b3('bum): dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs ni/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs
154b4('bum): pa lta ci zhig spros/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos dad ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lnga yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ du nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni
154b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi myigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmanyam pa nyid la
154b6('bum): 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam
154b7('bum): pany-id la 'das de'i dus dmyigs pa la tsan ga smras/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig smos/ dkar byung ba'i dus dbugs pa la yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stong pa'idan sngon gyi ma
154b8('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi nang bab na phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ bya seng pazhid daltar byung ba myi dmyigs/ bri ming pa nyid / dus gsum mnyam pa'i myi daphyogs te/ de ci byo zhen ya kyi
155a1('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ong ba'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyidi la mi dmyigs/ na mnyam
155a2('bum): banyid ma 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig spos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lnga ci zhig smosarab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyig
155a3('bum): phyinang spong ba nyid na phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byi nang song ba nyid ni da lngar byung bar myi daphyogs/ phyinang stong banyid ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ daci'i phyir men/ rab byed mnyam pa 'ong
155a4('bum): das pa'i rus m+b+ha dmyigs mnyam pa cing la ma 'ongs pa dus m-i dmyigs/ mnyam pa la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs nam
155a5('bum): panyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig spros/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba nga sa dmyigs la yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong
155a6('bum): nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te// 
155a7('bum): ma phyir na/ rab 'byor dmanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'os pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs ma
155a8('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs pa lta ci nig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lnga ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de chen po stong pani
155b1('bum): ni sngond kyi mthar mi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs chen po stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs te/ de ci
155b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
155b3('bum): nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig spos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa la yang ci zhig s+ho/ 
155b4('bum): rlab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa snang panyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa so
155b5('bum): nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs // de ci'i nin/ rab 'byor das mnyam pa zhing ma 'angs pa'i dus ming mI gas/ mnyam pa 'ang la ma 'odzengs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa
155b6('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa 'dadi la dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lnga ci zhig spos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la tsa zhig smos/ nga war gyu
155b7('bum): dus dmyigs bra la yang sa zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ 'dres byas stong pa'i ni/ 
155b8('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyidri la mi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myo dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa 'di la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang ma
156a1('bum): dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang marnam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam panyid la 'das par dus dmyigs pa sa ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig spos/ da ltar byung ba
156a2('bum): dus dmyigs pa lnga yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigasa'adus ma byas stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs
156a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ldan
156a4('bum): byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pard kyis myi dmyigs/ ma'am pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ dam/ 
156a5('bum): byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da mtha' la sa 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das
156a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo rang mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
156a7('bum): pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs lnga ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs
156a8('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de thog mu dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs tem thog ma dang tha
156b1('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dam nyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa ni
156b2('bum): la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ong ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta mi na
156b3('bum): smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed stong pa nyid ni da lta/ 
156b4('bum): byung bar myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la dras pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyim
156b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid kyis myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid/ la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs pa lnga zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyig
156b6('bum): pa lta ci zhig spros/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyags pa lta yang ci zhig sa sa/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid na sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyin
156b7('bum): de ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rang ba nin stong ba da ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ deci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid ma ma los pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnam
156b8('bum): ting dus drung po dus kyang phyi dmyigs te/ nyam panyid kyang ba nyid la myi myigs dang 'jas pa das 'as pa dus dbyigs pa da yon ga smos/ ma mos pa dus dmigs pa tshanan nam/ ngang yul rdzo/ 
157a1('bum): dmyigs pa lnga yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
157a2('bum): ni ni da ltar byung bar mi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid / 
157a3('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigasamanyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos
157a4('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ de ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dman no/ stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
157a5('bum): ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
157a6('bum): 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mying dmyis
157a7('bum): na mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus myigs pa lta
157a8('bum): ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa
157b1('bum): stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung bar dus/ 
157b2('bum): kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs dus nga myigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lnga
157b3('bum): yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs te dngos
157b4('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ 
157b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
157b6('bum): dmyigs pa lnga ci zhig smos pa ma'ongs pa'i dus dmyigags pa lnga co zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ ngo bo 'di stong pa 'dan
157b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa 'di la 'das pa'i
157b8('bum): dus myi dmyigs dang mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyig te/ mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs
158a1('bum): ga ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi
158a2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa 'di ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsu
158a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung / 
158a4('bum): ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi de dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs dal ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta
158a5('bum): zhig smos/ da lngar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa/ ga ci zhig smos rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gi mthar myi kya dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i maH/ 
158a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la
158a7('bum): 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid lad ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la 'a/ 
158a8('bum): pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyags
158b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams ni phyi ma'i thar mi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni da ltar byung ba'i myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ deci
158b2('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang
158b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa/ lta zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta 'ang ci zhig smos
158b4('bum): rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ da 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrural gyi rkang pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
158b5('bum): rkang pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de cim phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ 
158b6('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i drus shes kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig/ 
158b7('bum): smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig spos/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dbang po rnams ni da ltar byung ba'i myi
158b8('bum): dmyigs/ dbang po rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ 
159a1('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig/ 
159a2('bum): smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ stobs rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmi/ 
159a3('bum): stobs rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa/ 
159a4('bum): nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang ma sham pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs
159a5('bum): ba lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang mi na ga smos/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthard mi dmyigs byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni
159a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam/ 
159a7('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs/ na
159a8('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan
159b1('bum): lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dbyigs/ 'phags pa'i sum yan lag brgyad pani phyi ma mthar myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i las lan 'gru brgyud pa ni kur byung ba'i myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam/ 
159b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i dus gsum mnyam pa 'dil myi dmyigs te/ dbye'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'ar mnam pa nyid pa 'das pa'i dus dbyigs pa gcin ga spos/ mangs pa nyid la ma chis pa'i dus myi dmigs// 
159b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid bdu mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na// mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs la yang ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa
159b4('bum): cizhig smos/ de ltar byung ba'i dus rimigs pa la yang na sa rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mas myidamigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni phyi ma 'om par myi
159b5('bum): dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni da ltar byung ba'i myid m+b+hi gas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam panyid la myi dmyigs te/ 'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor pa// 
159b6('bum): pa nyid la 'dras pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te// ma / 
159b7('bum): nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor
159b8('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni phyi ma'i thard myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa
160a1('bum): nyi la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs te mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid ma dka
160a2('bum): byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig
160a3('bum): smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor chad myed pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ chad myed pa rnams ni da ltar byung
160a4('bum): bar myi dmyigs tshad myed pa rnams ni dus gsum ma/ dam pa nyid la myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa 'dus
160a5('bum): myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi myigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
160a6('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs pa lnga yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga gzugs myong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 
160a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthu rang myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
160a8('bum): ni dus gsum pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
160b1('bum): dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs pa lnga ci zhig smos
160b2('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang mi zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thard brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par thard pa brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa
160b3('bum): brgyad ni dbyungs par myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs to/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyags/ mnyam
160b4('bum): ba nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i sa myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci
160b5('bum): zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig s+ho/ sa/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ra ba 'byor da mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rga ni sngon
160b6('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni da ltar byung ba'i myi dmyigs/ mthar
160b7('bum): gyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs ni
160b8('bum): dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i
161a1('bum): dus dmyigs pa la ni zhig spros/ da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa ni sngon gyi/ 
161a2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni da ltar/ 
161a3('bum): byung bar myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
161a4('bum): myi dmyigs // mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la/ 
161a5('bum): 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs po'i dus dadamyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs/ pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de mngon par shes pa rnaMs
161a6('bum): ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ mngon pa shes pa rnams ni phyi ma 'i mthar myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni da ltar byung mang bar myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus dus ga/ 
161a7('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la daltar byung ba'i dus kyang
161a8('bum): myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'as pa'i dus mi dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos/ de ltar byung brji
161b1('bum): dmyigs pa lnga yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzind rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni phyi ma'i mtharang mi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs
161b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa
161b3('bum): nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang / 
161b4('bum): ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig spro/ sa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi myigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 
161b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni de ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnam sa ni dus gsum mnyam pa 'di la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa 'di la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam
161b6('bum): nyid la 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs te mnyam pa nyid la dalta pa'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myigs pa lnga ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs
161b7('bum): pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni
161b8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
162a1('bum): rab 'byor de mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa/ 
162a2('bum): nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor
162a3('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni de ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa
162a4('bum): nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyem pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs
162a5('bum): te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam/ pa 'di la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ong / nyes pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus
162a6('bum): dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
162a7('bum): ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid
162a8('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs pa ldan zhig smos/ 
162b1('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lnga yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas
162b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa
162b3('bum): nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi
162b4('bum): dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na dmanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ mo 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba
162b5('bum): bi dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de gzhan la so so'i skye bo ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ so so'i skye bani phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar
162b6('bum): myi dmyigasaso so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 
162b7('bum): nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar da myi dmyigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyags su myed pa'i phyir/ 
162b8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni de ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum man/ 
163a1('bum): pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyig su myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dganan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthur myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems
163a2('bum): dnga'ani phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyidi la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyig su
163a3('bum): myo ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dgan ni yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon go mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da lngar byung bar mi dmyigs
163a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyig shes te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyigs su myed pa'i da/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
163a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad snyo mkhyen pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byas te/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
163a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis
163a7('bum): nan te rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
163a8('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ces bya ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la smras shing / 'das pa'i byang chub
163b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
163b2('bum): 'di 'di la slabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams chad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
163b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la srabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di na
163b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor/ 
163b5('bum): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di la slabs shi/ nga 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
163b6('bum): rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to// brnyes so// rnyes par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// 
163b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyag/ bam po/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams pa gang gi bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
163b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gnas gtan rab 'byor da 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i slad du skor ba mdzad pas 'di ni theg pa chen po
164a1('bum): bstand pa tsam du sems so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gam bcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
164a2('bum): pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur da lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar gyur pa myed de/ rab 'byor da khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
164a3('bum): mthun par theg pa chen po ston do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'
164a4('bum): chos sam sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i nang du 'dus shing khong du chud do// 8 ba 'byor gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang / 
164a5('bum): chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongasu chud pa de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas
164a6('bum): kyi chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs
164a7('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang
164a8('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
164b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
164b2('bum): pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
164b3('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed/ 
164b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
164b5('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / dga' chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / myi nyam
164b6('bum): chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyis rnam pa spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni dge pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi phar/ lang tu phyind pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ nyan
164b7('bum): thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang sangs rgyas kyi chos// rab 'byor de de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam rten
164b8('bum): gi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
165a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / gzugs pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / myig gang yin pa dang / 
165a2('bum): gzugs gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus de reg pa gang yin pa dang / myog gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sma gaH
165a3('bum): yin pa dang / rna ba rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i lus te rog pa gang yon pa dang / rnga ba'i dus te rig pa'i byind kyis tsho ba grang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa 'ang/ 
165a4('bum): rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sreg/ yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa gang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin/ 
165a5('bum): pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi dus te
165a6('bum): reg pa gang yin pa dang / sras kyi 'dus te rig pa'i sbyin kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yi gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin par
165a7('bum): rnam pa shes sa la da pa dang/ ga pag na pa dang/ ga pas/ bdugs pa gang yod padang skyes gzu sa gcan pas skye me drugs na pang/ dag pa / 
165b1('bum): bdang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / steng gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha ro ma tu phyin pa dang / nul khris
165b2('bum): kyipha rol du phyind pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes
165b3('bum): kyi rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong 'di gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / snang ba zhing stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po song pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pas/ 
165b4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa/ 
165b5('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thos cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po/ 
165b6('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bonyid stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / ngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa shes gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang / 
165b7('bum): yin pa dang / rdzu 'phral gnad pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / spobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yon pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang
165b8('bum): yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / chad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gzugs myod soms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par/ 
166a1('bum): na zhes pa drug gang yin pa dang / zil kyis mnon pa'i snye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang / rgyas nga'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas sa
166a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang sbyin// sdug sAl gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung bu gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa gang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
166a3('bum): ma byed ba dang smon pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / ting 'dzini gang yin pa dang / gdus kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa pa ni gang yin pa dang / sa so yang
166a4('bum): dag par rig pa pani gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa co brgyad gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / 
166a5('bum): gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos ga nga yin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig
166a6('bum): rten pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dus gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
166a7('bum): pas snyand pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin
166a8('bum): pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa 'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs myed pa stan du myed pa thogs pa myed pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa/ 
166b1('bum): sha stag ste/ rab 'byor de rnam grangs 'dis na khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po gang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'ang gzhan zhes
166b2('bum): bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar sa myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ 
166b3('bum): de ltar na theg pa chen po dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg/ 
166b4('bum): pa chen po dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang
166b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ nga gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / tshul
166b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar bya myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la basbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang sbyin pa'i pha rol/ 
166b7('bum): du phyin pa'ang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg sa
166b8('bum): chen po 'ang gzhan la phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang phyi stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la zhes bya ba skye/ 
167a1('bum): de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang
167a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang chen po stong pa nyid kyang gus su bya myed de gnyis su byar
167a3('bum): myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la
167a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po 'dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
167a5('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gan/ 
167a6('bum): zhes bya ba skyed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang mtha' las 'das 'basong panyid kyang gnyis su myed dganyis su byar byed do// theg pachen po'ang gzhan la thog ma dang ba byed pa stong panyid kyang gdun zhes bya bcwos
167a7('bum): ded sa dag badzin pa pa rtsog ma dang tha med pa dong panyid gnyis su med da gnyis su byung byed / theg chen po 'a gzhan la dor bskyed pa stod pa nyid kyang gzhang nas bya ba myed/ de me thug pa ni/ 
167a8('bum): na sa byed pa gang ba'i ba gas su myed dganyis su bya byed do// reg zichen po'i gzhin pa banan rang ba nga gnan zhes kya dri/ des pas se da su / 
167b1('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su
167b2('bum): byar myed do// theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa
167b3('bum): chen po'ang gzhan la myi rimyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la dngos
167b4('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na dag pa chen po dang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la ngo bo nyid song pa
167b5('bum): nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ga pa chen po 'ang gzhan la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
167b6('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
167b7('bum): kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myed do/ theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la
167b8('bum): zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ 
168a1('bum): srid theg pa po d+hu phrul gyinang parnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byung byed do/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la dbang po rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar mtheg pa cher bag
168a2('bum): dang po rnams kyang gnyis su myed do gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la stobs rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang stobs rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnasu
168a3('bum): rkye myong ngo// theg pa chen po rang gzhan la byang chub kyi yan lag mangs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de lar na theg pa chen po dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar byed do// theg
168a4('bum): btson po'ang gnan la 'phags pa'i lam lan lag brgyad pa'ar gnan nas bya ba skyed de/ des par rnam pa chen po dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gnyis su meng da gnasu byar byed // 
168a5('bum): zlog pa chen po'ang gnanas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams cad gzhan ces b+ha bskyed de/ de sar theg pa chen po dang phags ba'i don pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed da gnyis su byang myed de// 
168a6('bum): theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar theg pa chen po dang bsam gtan rnams kyang gan su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la
168a7('bum): tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang tshad myed pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyisu byar myed do// theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 
168a8('bum): rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de ga'i su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la rnam par thard pa
168b1('bum): d+ha kyang gzhan nas bya babyed / des dad theg pa chen po rnams pa da pa brgyad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byang byed do// theg pa chen po 'angaganan ma mthas khyim gnas pa goms par
168b2('bum): 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan nas bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed de/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la rnam par
168b3('bum): da pa'i sloslong pa dang macan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'ang gzhan ces byang byed de/ ltu can thag pa can po dang par thar po'i sgra grang pa'o dang mtshan ma myed pa spyod pa kyad par gnyis
168b4('bum): gas su bya myed do// thog pa chen po'ang gan sa mngon par shes pa rnams cad gan nas bya ba mye dang/ de ldaldan ga chen po da mngon pa shes pa rnams kya sanyis byed / 
168b5('bum): gnyis su byar byed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la ting nge lani rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba byed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byang med
168b6('bum): ga pa chen po'ing gzhan la gzus kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de la na reg pachen po dang gzus kyi snyornams kya gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// thog pachen pa 'ang gnan mong/ 
168b7('bum): da gshegs pa'i yongs su 'ang gnan nas byang byudang / de la theg pa chen po pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed/ theg pa chen po
168b8('bum): gzhan la mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'pha bzhin zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan so so yang dag par
169a1('bum): rig pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la snying rje chen po 'ang gzhan zhes
169a2('bum): bya ba byed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'ang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar med do/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar narjes
169a3('bum): brjod pa dang sangs rgyas kyi nas ma dres pa'i ci brgyad kyang gnyis su me gnyis byar myong // rab byod rnam grangs des na zag pa chen po snyan pas shes rab kyi pa rolang du phyid pa stan par 'gyur ro// shes kyi
169a4('bum): tharomang du phyin pa snyan pas theg pa chen po snyan par 'gyur ro// nas tshe dang ldan parab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad des gsolang do// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sos
169a5('bum): dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa'i rna phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ni dbusasu myi dmyigs te/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang
169a6('bum): chu sems dpa' kun du mtha yas par rig par bya'o// tshor ba kun du mthara' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du shes kun tu mthar yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems pa/ 
169a7('bum): kun du mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du byed kun du mtha' yas pa'i slang du byang chub sems dang 'akun tu mthar yas par rig par bgyi'o// rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu/ 
169a8('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmyigs so// tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis myi dmyigs so// 'du shes/ 
169b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis myi dmyigs so// 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de/ 
169b2('bum): lta bu'ang ma mchis myi dmyigs de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ ma dmyigs na byang chub
169b3('bum): sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su sten par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' ga
169b4('bum): zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang la gdams shing snyan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ni mying tsam du bas te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag ces bgyi/ 
169b5('bum): ba yang bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi bayang byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par grub pa ma mchiso// de ltar/ 
169b6('bum): rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lnga yang gang zhig rjes/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba lnga yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta yang gang
169b7('bum): zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du byed pa yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa lnga yang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa ni gzugs lags/ 
169b8('bum): gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i de ni 'du byed ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ 
170a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub du spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmyigasu ma mchis na/ mngon par ma grub pa mngon par ma
170a2('bum): grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams su ma mchis sam/ gal te de ltar stand pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dzum yongs su mi 'dzum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing yid mi
170a3('bum): 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 
170a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nga chen po sngon gi mthar dmyigs su myed pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dgas su myed pa yin/ dbus su dmyigasu myed pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa
170a5('bum): rab 'byor ci'i phyir na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chu ba sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ ra ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
170a6('bum): yas par rig par bya ba yin// 'du shes kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du byed kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mthan/ 
170a7('bum): sa par rig par bya ba yin/ rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa'
170a8('bum): zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang myed de cing mi dmyigs pa/ 
170b1('bum): yin/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
170b2('bum): ci'i phyir ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thas cad du thams cad rnam par thams du thams cad la yang dag par rjes su mthong ma dmyigs na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha
170b3('bum): rold tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su stand par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gis yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ma dmyigs na
170b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su smond par bgyi zhes sma/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'dra/ 
170b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du/ bas so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi/ gang yang bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma
170b6('bum): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
170b7('bum): la gzugs mngon par ma grub blta yang gang zhig mchis/ tshor ba mngon par ma grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis 'du shes mngon par ma grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ 'du byed mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis// 
170b8('bum): rna bar shes pa mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis te/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lagaso/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lag so// 
171a1('bum): gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smras/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du mngon par ma grub pa
171a2('bum): zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gangs shing rjes su snyan par bgyi 'am zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang byang chub sems dpa/ 
171a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmyigasu ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyin na de skad du gal de de ltar stand pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dzum yod/ 
171a4('bum): su mi 'dzum 'gyod par myi 'gyur zhing yid mi 'jigs mi sta nga skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces
171a5('bum): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh-i dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa shi ti'i bu se mas can myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma
171a6('bum): dmyigs so// sems can stong ba dang sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir byang
171a7('bum): nub seMs dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ sems can song ba dang sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ me dang ldan pa sho ra dwa to'i chu
171a8('bum): sems can myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// sems can stong pa dang sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so/ tshe dang / 
171b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na sems can myed pa dang / sems can ston pa dang sems dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa la sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myigs/ dbus myi dmyig
171b2('bum): so sems can myed pa'ang gzhan sems can ston pa'ang gzhan/ sems can de byin pa'ang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin myed pa'ang gzhan zhig la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gi
171b3('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sems can myed pa gang yin pa dang / seMs can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can/ 
171b4('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams/ 
171b5('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar/ dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi maHra myi dmyigaso/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang / 
171b6('bum): sngon gi mtha myi dmyigaso// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chubab sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs ngo bo na myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ston gi mtha' myi dmyigs so// 
171b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems/ dpa'
171b8('bum): mi'i mthar myi dmyigs/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyig so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
172a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
172a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs myed pa dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dbus su myi dmyigs te/ gzugs me
172a3('bum): pa 'ang ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa 'du ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma la/ 
172a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gzugs myed pa'i gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang / 
172a5('bum): yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams
172a6('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
172a7('bum): mthar mi dmyigaso// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub
172a8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i thar myi dmyig so/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngom
172b1('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
172b2('bum): dmyig so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i du
172b3('bum): tshor ba myed pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang tshor ba dben pa dang / tshor ba myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba myed pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin tshor
172b4('bum): ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi mi
172b5('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang / ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang cho rab myed pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
172b6('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de/ dag thams cad kyang gnyis
172b7('bum): su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyig so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' mi dmyigs
172b8('bum): 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigaso// 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
173a1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyi/ 
173a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so/ 'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyig so/ 'du shes dben pa'i phyi
173a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa dang 'du shes stong pa nyidang/ 
173a4('bum): 'du shes dben pa dang 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyig so/ dbus su myi dmyigs te/ 'du shes myed dpa 'ang gzhan ma yin 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yin/ 
173a5('bum): 'du shes dben pa 'ang ma yin/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang ma yin bya/ nga chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'angag ni na ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'a'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang / 
173a6('bum): gzhan ma yin no// me dang ldan pa shar dwada'i bu de lngar na 'du shes myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du shes dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sde/ 
173a7('bum): dab glang yin pa dang gi ma dza gang yin pa dang / phyi mi mtha gang min pa dang lus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang dganyi su mye dganyis su byar byed do/ me dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu bye dru bu bya chu
173a8('bum): sems dpa'i sngon gi mther myi dmyigaso// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 'du byed/ 
173b1('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbya' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i thar myi dmyigaso// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
173b2('bum): dmyig so 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus/ 
173b3('bum): su myo / slo das kyi byang chub sems dpa sus su rigs so/ 'du byed ban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa dbus su mi dmyigs// 'du byung ba tid byung po phyi nga rnarnams dpa
173b4('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs depa'i phyir zhe na/ me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa dang 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dngon pa dang 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ dbus
173b5('bum): su myi dmyigs 'du byed myengad pa'ang gzhan yon/ 'du byed stong pad kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin 'du byed nga bo nyid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
173b6('bum): dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gnan ma yin/ phyi mi'i me tha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ mchod lnga can pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
173b7('bum): 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus
173b8('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// rna bar shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' smon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
173b9('bum): yang yin pa de thos pa kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna bA shre ba myed ni phyi byang chub seMs sngon gi mthang mi dmyig so// 
174a1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// rna bar
174a2('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rna bar shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' dbus su myi
174a3('bum): dmyigaso rna bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses dpa' dbus su mi dmyig so/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
174a4('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa she rat+na ti'i bu rna par shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang rnamapar shes pa dben pa dang / rna bar shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang sngon gyi / 
174a5('bum): 'ang mi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang mi dmyigs dbus mi dmyigs te/ tan par shes pa myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la ni/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan yin// 
174a6('bum): rna bar shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rmi
174a7('bum): par shes pa 'ang yin pa dang rna bar shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa sodaben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
174a8('bum): gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// mig stong pa
174b1('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyig so/ myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// myig ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so/ mig myed pa'i
174b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigaso// mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// mig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
174b3('bum): phyir byang chub seMs dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// myig myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmyig so/ myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chu
174b4('bum): dbus su mi dmyig so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mi gra myed pa dang mig stong pa nyid dang mig dben pa dang / mig ngo bo nyid la sngon gri mthar mi dmyigaso// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus mi dmigs
174b5('bum): myig myed pa 'ang gzhan yin/ mig stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma mi na myig dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan yi na byang chub ses dpa' 'ang gzhan yin/ sngon gi mtha' nga gzhan mi
174b6('bum): yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan yin dbus kyang gzhanas yin no// chedang ston pa shang d+ha ti'i bu de ltar na myig myed pa gang yin pa dang / mig spong panyid gang yin pa dang / 'amig ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
174b7('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyisu byar med do// me dang ldani pa shir dwa de'i burna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' ste
174b8('bum): gi mthar mi dmyigaso rno ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyagaso rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dang sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub ses rapa sngon gi mthar mi dmying/ 
175a1('bum): so// rna ba myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar/ 
175a2('bum): myi dmyigs/ rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ rna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi
175a3('bum): dmyigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba myed
175a4('bum): dang / rna ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dben pa dang rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la so/ na gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dadamyigs te/ rna ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyang
175a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rna ba dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin rna ba ngo bo nyid myed de/ 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gan
175a6('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na na ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sos
175a7('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna myed pa'i phyir bya
175a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
175b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ sna myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ snga stong pani tu phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ snga dben pa'i phyir byang
175b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs
175b3('bum): dba' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// snga ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
175b4('bum): de ltar na snga myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang snang ben pa gang yin pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid byed pa gang yin pa dang / bya byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
175b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang ga/ nyi su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti/ 'i bu lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
175b6('bum): lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs//
