175b7('bum): lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// sde dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ lce ngo bo nyid
175b8('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so/ lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses dang / 
176a1('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce myed pa dang lce stong pa nyid dang / lce dben pa dang lce ngo bo nyid
176a2('bum): myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce ngo bo nyid myed pa gzhan
176a3('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce myed pa gang yin pa
176a4('bum): lce stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyir ma'i mtha' gang yin pa/ 
176a5('bum): dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed dag/ nyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus myed pa'i phyi ra byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ lus stong pa nyidakyi
176a6('bum): phyir byang chu ba sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ sus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ lus bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyimathar myi rig
176a7('bum): sus rnyi par byer byang chu ba sems dpa' phyi ma'i mamar sti dmyigs// sras stong pa phyi byang chu sems dpa' phyim 'o ma par myi daphyogs/ sus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyim ma mye khyen
176a8('bum): lus ngam nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi na'i mthar myi dmyigs/ lus myengad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so/ lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyogaso// 
176b1('bum): lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus myed pa dang / 
176b2('bum): lus dben pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus dben
176b3('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
176b4('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus med pa ga/ nga yin pa dang / lus stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub seMs
176b5('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid
176b6('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso/ yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// 
176b7('bum): yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
176b8('bum): myi dmyigs// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// yid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
177a1('bum): dmyig so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi
177a2('bum): dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid myed pa dang yid stong pa nyid dang / yid dben pa dang / yid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
177a3('bum): yid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid ngo bo nyid byed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan
177a4('bum): ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang yid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
177a5('bum): yid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yi na pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yi rten pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis
177a6('bum): byar myed do// / dum bu bzhi pa/ bam po'o// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
177a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed/ 
177a8('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
177b1('bum): gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
177b2('bum): myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang / 
177b3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid dgazugs myed pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mthar gyi
177b4('bum): dmyigs dbus su myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs pa ben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan
177b5('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha 'a'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbu sa kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs
177b6('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
177b7('bum): pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
177b8('bum): sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra nga ba mying pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs
178a1('bum): sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
178a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
178a3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs sa/ sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa
178a4('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs/ sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu rdza su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
178a5('bum): sgra myed pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi/ mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyi/ gas te/ sgra myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sgra stong pa nyid kyang
178a6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sgra dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan
178a7('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sgra myed pa gang yin pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sgra dben pa gang yin pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chu
178a8('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu dri myed pa
178b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs sa/ dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri nga ba nyid ste
178b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// dri myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myo dmyigs so// dri dben pa'i/ 
178b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dri med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir
178b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir/ 
178b5('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri med pa dang dri dben pa dang dri ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon go mtha' myi dmyigs so/ dri phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ dri myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
178b6('bum): dri stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dri dben pa 'ong gzhan ma yin/ dri nga ba nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan
178b7('bum): ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dri myed pa gang yin pa dang / dri stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dri dben pa gang yin pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
178b8('bum): drapa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed do/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro myed pa'i phyir byang chub
179a1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso/ ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso/ ro rngan can
179a2('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ro myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 'o
179a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ro myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ ro stong pa nyid
179a4('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ro dben/ da pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// ro ngo bo nyid da myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir/ 
179a5('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro myed pa dang / ro stong pa nyid nga nga ro dben pa dang / ro ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ ro myed pa'ang gzhan
179a6('bum): ma yin/ ro stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ro dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ re ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang
179a7('bum): g+ha'adam yin bus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ro myed pa gang yin pa dang / ro stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ro dben pa gang yin pa dang / rong bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
179a8('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
179b1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
179b2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ reg dben pa'i phyir byang na/ 
179b3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir
179b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ reg ngo bo nyid myed da pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir/ 
179b5('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg myed pa dang reg stong pa nyid dang / reg dben pa dang reg ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi da myigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ reg
179b6('bum): myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ reg stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ reg dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma/ 
179b7('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na reg myed pa gang gi la/ reg stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid
179b8('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe ngas
180a1('bum): ldan pa shar dwati'i bu chos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bran gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chum sesangs/ 
180a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// chos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems da / 
180a3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos myed pa'i phyir byang
180a4('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// chos dben pa'i// phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos ngo bo nyid
180a5('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zho na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos myed pa dang chos stong pa nyid dang / chos dben pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
180a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang
180a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chos myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
180a8('bum): chos dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa deng thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de
180b1('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyig so// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
180b2('bum): myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
180b3('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyig so// myig gyi rnam par shes
180b4('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyi gas so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang nga chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigaso// myig gyi rnam par shes
180b5('bum): pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' da bus su myi dmyigaso// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang / 
180b6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa mye/ 
180b7('bum): pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / ti myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
180b8('bum): myig gi nam par shes pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyog gi rnam par shes pa ro ba nyid pyod pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bya
181a1('bum): chub sems dpe'u 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta chan myig gri rnam par shes
181a2('bum): me myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin/ pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa'
181a3('bum): gla yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i/ 
181a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
181a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi na/ gso/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
181a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// 
181a7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ni/ 
181a8('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ rna pa'i rnam par shes pa dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// rna pa'i rnam par shes par ba nyid byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
181b1('bum): myi byigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bun pa rnam par shes pa skyed pa dang / na ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / na ba'i rnam par shes pa ba nyid kyis
181b2('bum): pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dpon
181b3('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan mi yin/ snron gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
181b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa tati'i bu de sbyar na na pa'i rnam par shes pa myed/ da pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ga ngan pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ma
181b5('bum): rnam par shes pa banyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems mdapa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi
181b6('bum): skyed deganyis su byang byed de// ma pagad dang bu ma pa gas pa byed pa bya chu ba sems da bra gi mar byi myigs so/ ris pa shes pa nga pa nyid kyi nga byung nab pom pa
181b7('bum): don gas phying rlom sa pa shes pa da pa phyi byu pa sems dang po ma par myi tshigs/ na pa pa ma byed pa da chu sa so // 
181b8('bum): snga nim byi zhes pa byed pa byad byang chub sems dag phyi ma ba bar phyir daphyogs so// 'i nam pa gas pa snyed pashing gi phyir byang chub rims dpang bye ma ya myi gyig yo 'a
182a1('bum): ga shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// sna'i rnam par/ 
182a2('bum): shes pa skyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs sa/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigasaso/ snga'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byangs
182a3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myir dmyigaso/ snga'i rnam par shes pa ngo ba nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa myed
182a4('bum): bdang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sA'i rnam/ dpar shes pa dben pa dang / snga'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa nga la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs pa/ 
182a5('bum): myi dbyigs te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'ang gzhanas yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhanam yin/ 'i rnam par shes pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ snga'i rnam
182a6('bum): shes pa rdo ba nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan
182a7('bum): bshar da ti'i bu de ltar na sa'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / gA rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes partse
182a8('bum): bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' glang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis myed de gnyisu byar myed do/ 
182b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 
182b2('bum): lde'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa rdo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// lce'i rnam par shes
182b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
182b4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
182b5('bum): su myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam parashes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi gyi
182b6('bum): so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
182b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myod pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la
182b8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong tsha ba nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
183a1('bum): ga gdapa' 'ang gnan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin/ 
183a2('bum): dang / lce rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yon pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo ba nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang ston ga/ 
183a3('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyima'i mtha' gang 'ad pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed da/ tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa byed pa'i phyir bya chu ba sems
183a4('bum): dba' ponag mthar gyi dbyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ delus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
183a5('bum): ga mthar myi dmyigs sa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa de ba nyid myed pa 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha na
183a6('bum): myi dmyigs so/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam
183a7('bum): par shes pa ngo bo nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
183a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
183b1('bum): myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa
183b2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
183b3('bum): lus kyi rnam pa shes pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i
183b4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
183b5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
183b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi maH
183b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
183b8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi rnam par she
184a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med
184a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems pa
184a3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
184a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par she sa pa myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngos/ 
184a5('bum): nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'a myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang
184a6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa 'du nini byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
184a7('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin no// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
184a8('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
184b1('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs/ 
184b2('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi ma
184b3('bum): myi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi
184b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// myig gi 'dus
184b5('bum): te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de bus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang
184b6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa
184b7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus
184b8('bum): te reg pa myod pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yon/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bya
185a1('bum): sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mthu'a'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myig gi 'dus te re// 
185a2('bum): pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dang / 
185a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i burna pa'i 'dus te reg pa
185a4('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so/ darna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben par
185a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'du sa te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi ma ra myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang
185a6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
185a7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
185a8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
185b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / 
185b2('bum): rna ba'i dus te reg pa bzhid myed pa la sngon gamatha gyi dbyigs phyi ma'omathar gyi dmyigs/ dus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te dag pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ na ba'i dus te reg pa myong ba'i/ 
185b3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin
185b4('bum): sngo gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yid/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan da ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa/ ra da'i bun pa'i 'dus te rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna
185b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed du/ gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
185b6('bum): sdong gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snga'i nus te reg pa myed pa'i phyi
185b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byangadra chupa sems dpa' sngon sa
185b8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa de bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthur myi migs so// 
186a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed/ 
186a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
186a3('bum): dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
186a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ste/ nga pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang sna'i 'dus te reg/ pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi
186a5('bum): dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'ang gzhan ma yi na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'du sa te reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo
186a6('bum): nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na smra'i
186a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
186a8('bum): ba dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub smos
186b1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigaso/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
186b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
186b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
186b4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub se das dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyi da kyi phyir byang chub ses dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so lce'i 'dus te
186b5('bum): reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dadwa
186b6('bum): ti bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dbus/ 
186b7('bum): myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma
186b8('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang
187a1('bum): yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon na/ 
187a2('bum): mtha' gdu smin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus/ 
187a3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigaso/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed
187a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma dathar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
187a5('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te re ga pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi myigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses das/ 
187a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te/ 
187a7('bum): rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu lus kyi dung ste/ 
187a8('bum): reg pa myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te lus te/ 
187b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin byang chub sa/ 
187b2('bum): dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus
187b3('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin par/ 
187b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang ga/ nyi su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dbu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi/ 
187b5('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chu ba sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi
187b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya
187b7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha'
187b8('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa
188a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus
188a2('bum): te reg pa med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo ba nyid byed pa la sngon gi mtha' mi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
188a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
188a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gan dan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg
188a5('bum): ba med pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ga yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub ses
188a6('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi sa byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa che/ 
188a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te/ 
188a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs so// 
188b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso
188b2('bum): e tsa A U / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyin no ches kyis sa
188b3('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
188b4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
188b5('bum): ba myed pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / myi ga gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi man
188b6('bum): myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi/ 
188b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang / 
188b8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshe nad kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
189a1('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sos/ 
189a2('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
189a3('bum): kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen ni
189a4('bum): kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyi gas so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// rna ba'i 'dus
189a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'o// mthar myi dmyig so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
189a6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi
189a7('bum): dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
189a8('bum): dmyigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
189b1('bum): dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshu
189b2('bum): ba dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma/ 
189b3('bum): yin rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa 'di
189b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi/ mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sha dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 
189b5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba 'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin po dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
189b6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
189b7('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi/ 
189b8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa
190a1('bum): shA phyi byang chub sems dpa' san gi mthar myi dmyigs sa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i byid kyis tshor bskyed par phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshar ba sto
190a2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid
190a3('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya/ 
190a4('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu sudamyi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed
190a5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ste/ 
190a6('bum): pa nyid dang snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' mi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te sna'i 'du
190a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshar ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yon/ sna'i 'dus te reg than
190a8('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba de ba ny-id yod pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ong gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar na/ 
190b1('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang sna'i/ 
190b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
190b3('bum): med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
190b4('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis rmo
190b5('bum): ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyi gas so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir bye nga chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
190b6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
190b7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi/ 
190b8('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo
191a1('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
191a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dug
191a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te re/ 
191a4('bum): pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bya 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i/ ra mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldanapa/ 
191a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mye dpa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshe rab
191a6('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
191a7('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// lus kyi
191a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// 
191b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems de pa'i'u phyi ma'i mthar rmi
191b2('bum): dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma
191b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sred pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dge
191b4('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi / dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i
191b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sese dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 
191b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
191b7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te/ 
191b8('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma
192a1('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi dus
192a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
192a3('bum): pa'i rten gyis ra ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi/ 
192a4('bum): su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa da'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi ma dathar myi dmyigaso/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong / 
192a5('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
192a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg
192a7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te/ 
192a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus/ 
192b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so yid kyi 'dus te res
192b2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i phyi
192b3('bum): kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi myigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// dbus
192b4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa 'a rang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
192b5('bum): tshor ba dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma/ 
192b6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
192b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi maH
192b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// / 
193a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
193a2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi
193a3('bum): dmyigs so// sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir
193a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i kha mas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthaSha/ de nar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems das/ 
193a5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigaso/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya/ nga chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams de zin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs so// sa'i khwa
193a6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams med pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khas
193a7('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus mi dmyigs te/ sa'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams dben pa 'angs
193a8('bum): ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang lda/ 
193b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sa'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang sa'i khams ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yi// 
193b2('bum): ba dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyisu byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chu
193b3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi/ 
193b4('bum): dmyigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chubab sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams da med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// 
193b5('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyir ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chu
193b6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs so// chu'i khas
193b7('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams myed
193b8('bum): pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te chu'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin
194a1('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma/ 
194a2('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chu'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yinapa/ 
194a3('bum): dang na chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis su
194a4('bum): byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu me'i khams myed dpa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// 
194a5('bum): mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so/ me'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub
194a6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so/ me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams
194a7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigaso/ me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
194a8('bum): me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su mi dmyig so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu me'i khams myed pa dang / 
194b1('bum): me'i khams stong pa nyid dang / me'i khams dben pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ me'i khams myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ mye'i
194b2('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
194b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na me'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang mye'i khams dben pa gang yin pa
194b4('bum): dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
194b5('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
194b6('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs phyi rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// rlung gi khams rtse/ 
194b7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
194b8('bum): dbyigs so// rlung gi khams ngo sashad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya tsu
195a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
195a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams myed pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ rlung gi khwa
195a3('bum): myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha/ 
195a4('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzha na ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rlung gi khams/ myed pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung
195a5('bum): gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams
195a6('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon go// 
195a7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams// 
195a8('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
195b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// nam mkha'i khabs sdos
195b2('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi/ 
195b3('bum): dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa dang nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' mying
195b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nam mkha'i kham ngas myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang dgazhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin na mkha'i
195b5('bum): khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'a/ gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' bang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
195b6('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na nam mkha'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub seMs
195b7('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang / 
195b8('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// / 
196a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// rnam par shes pam gyi
196a2('bum): sto pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
196a3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rdo rje
196a4('bum): shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi nga dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
196a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang / rnam par na rnas pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' mying byis
196a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan yon
196a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang
196a8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i
196b1('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan/ 
196b2('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
196b3('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs// ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid
196b4('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ ma ri/ ga pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi da dmyigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
196b5('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa 'a dbus su myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so/ ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
196b6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa myed pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang rnga mu rig pa
196b7('bum): dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin ma rig pa dpe
196b8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// 
197a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma rig pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi
197a2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ 
197a3('bum): 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// 
197a4('bum): 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ ra 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi datan dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
197a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang / 'a phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs
197a6('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
197a7('bum): bu'adu byed myed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa
197a8('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa 'ang ga nan ma yin/ 'du byed nga ba nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma rgya yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma sa
