197b1('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
197b2('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed kyi
197b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi
197b4('bum): mtha' myi dmyigaso// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// rnam par she/ nyes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// 
197b5('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma thar myi dmyigaso/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed kyi
197b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmyigs
197b7('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna par shes
197b8('bum): pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa myed pa
198a1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma
198a2('bum): yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
198a3('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis bya/ 
198a4('bum): skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs med pa'i phyir bya ngang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzu dwags stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi das
198a5('bum): so// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ra byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs
198a6('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
198a7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// mying dang gzugs stong
198a8('bum): ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi
198b1('bum): dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / mying dang gzugs dben pa dang / mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs so// 
198b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed/ 
198b3('bum): pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mying dang gzugs
198b4('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dmying dang gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs ngon nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon
198b5('bum): gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yi na pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems / 
198b6('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med ni/ 
198b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye
198b8('bum): drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyigs so// skye mched dug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyig kyi
199a1('bum): skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
199a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug med pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang skye mched drug dben pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa
199a3('bum): la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye mched drug med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug dben pa 'ang gzhan ma
199a4('bum): yin/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub/ sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan// ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan
199a5('bum): yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug med pa gang yi na pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pas
199a6('bum): yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
199a7('bum): reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyig so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
199a8('bum): myi dmyig so// reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal
199b1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
199b2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
199b3('bum): sems dpa' bus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa myed pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid dang / reg pa dben pa dang reg pa ngo ba nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha'
199b4('bum): myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa dben pa 'ang gzha/ na ma yin/ reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin byang chub sos
199b5('bum): dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i ma tha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang lnga na pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang reg pa
199b6('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang nu zhes/ snron gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de lta gnyi su med de/ 
199b7('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i
199b8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs sa/ tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// tsher bdu na
200a1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
200a2('bum): dmyigs so// tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ 
200a3('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs s+ho/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs
200a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba myed pa 'ang gde zhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin bya
200a5('bum): sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / 
200a6('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang
200a7('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi maH
200a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyir/ 
200b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigaso// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang / 
200b2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi
200b3('bum): dmyigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa myed pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid dang sred pa dben pa dang sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa
200b4('bum): la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigaso// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ sred pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa stong pa nyid kyi dang gzhan ma yin sred pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin sred pa ngo bo nyid
200b5('bum): myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sred
200b6('bum): po myed pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sred pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' ga/ 
200b7('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs
200b8('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa myed pa'i phyir
201a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa
201a2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ len pa de/ 
201a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha re dwa ti'i bu len pa myed pa dang len pa stong pa nyid dang / 
201a4('bum): len pa dben pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ len pa byed pa dang gzhan ma yin len pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ len pa de/ 
201a5('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bya nga chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan kya ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de
201a6('bum): ltar na len pa med pa gang yin pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang len pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
201a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngond gi mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid
201a8('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so sring
201b1('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
201b2('bum): srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// srid pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
201b3('bum): srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa myed pa dang srid pa
201b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang srid pa dben pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi/ mthar mi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyig das te/ srid pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
201b5('bum): yin/ srid pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa nga gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sdo na gi mtha' bang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
201b6('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na srid pa myong ba gang yin pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / srid pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub seMs/ 
201b7('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub so// 
201b8('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigasaso// skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sa su/ 
202a1('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub
202a2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
202a3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
202a4('bum): bu skye ba myed pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang skye ba dben pa dang / skye ba dngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' mye / myigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye
202a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba ngo bo nyid 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhi na ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma
202a6('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gnan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skye ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub seMs/ 
202a7('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi myed pa'i phyir byang chu
202a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ rga shing ba nyid med pa'i phyir/ 
202b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ rga shi myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so/ rga shi dben gyi
202b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rga shi myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// rga shi stong pa nyid
202b3('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
202b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi myed pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid du/ dang rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi myigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ rga shi myed pa 'ang / 
202b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dpe na pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yi chu chu nga smon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
202b6('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rga shi myed pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub ses dang/ 
202b7('bum): gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
202b8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
203a1('bum): smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
203a2('bum): phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sos/ 
203a3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa
203a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig/ na so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub semangs dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
203a5('bum): bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i
203a6('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin sbyin pa'i pha
203a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sbyin
203a8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub
203b1('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/ 
203b2('bum): phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dper
203b3('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byangadu
203b4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tuphyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar / dadamyigaso// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
203b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang/ 
203b6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bus
203b7('bum): su myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / 
203b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
204a1('bum): 5tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa / yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin tshul khrims/ 
204a2('bum): kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
204a3('bum): sha ra da ti'i bu de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang tshul khrims kyi/ 
204a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis/ 
204a5('bum): byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin nye pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
204a6('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar ni/ 
204a7('bum): dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// bzod pa'i pha
204a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myeru/ 
204b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
204b2('bum): bu myi dmyigs so/ bzod pa'i ma lang du byin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs pa/ de ci'i phyir na na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bzod pa
204b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
204b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ bzod po'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'inye pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol/ 
204b5('bum): tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'o mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldanapa/ 
204b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu/ 
204b7('bum): phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed do// 
204b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
205a1('bum): myi dmyig s+ho/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' san/ 
205a2('bum): gi mthar myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthu/ 
205a3('bum): myi dmyig so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sde ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
205a4('bum): myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byangang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' lus su mi
205a5('bum): dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su/ 
205a6('bum): myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dben pa dang
205a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi
205a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa
205b1('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang
205b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolapa tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dang
205b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gi pha
205b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi myigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gri mthar mi dmyigaso// bas martan
205b5('bum): gi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi ma thar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
205b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rolab tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// 
205b7('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi daphyis
205b8('bum): so// bsam gten gi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigaso// bsam
206a1('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan
206a2('bum): gi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmigs
206a3('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yi na/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
206a4('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yi// na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma
206a5('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bsam gtan gi pha ro/ lad tu phyind pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa
206a6('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa/ 
206a7('bum): de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
206a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
206b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
206b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sos pa/ 
206b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// 
206b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
206b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid dang / shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
206b6('bum): ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyin pa myed pa ye nga gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gnan
206b7('bum): ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
206b8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'dra gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
207a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa/ 
207a2('bum): dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// bam po gsum pa
207a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya
207a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid du ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
207a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ nang stong pa nyid/ myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
207a6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
207a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
207a8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong
207b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
207b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha'i yang / 
207b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa ste/ 
207b4('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yi ngan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi ma tha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin/ 
207b5('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshed nga ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub se sa dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa
207b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa'
207b7('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 
207b8('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chu
208a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// 
208a2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid myed pa dang phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa
208a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon go mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 
208a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'dags
208a5('bum): ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong ra pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
208a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su/ 
208a7('bum): byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// 
208a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
208b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ 
208b2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
208b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi ning stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ de cis
208b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs
208b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang
208b6('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
208b7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sde
208b8('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
209a1('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben/ 
209a2('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub de
209a3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
209a4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
209a5('bum): dmyigs so/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
209a6('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ 
209a7('bum): dben pa dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ 
209a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' 'dags
209b1('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid
209b2('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang
209b3('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gi
209b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
209b5('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid/ myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
209b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ 
209b7('bum): po stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigasaso// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub se sa
209b8('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
210a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa 'ang / 
210a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
210a3('bum): sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
210a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sem des dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i
210a5('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
210a6('bum): myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa
210a7('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyin
210a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' phyi/ 
210b1('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs so// don dam pa
210b2('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa titi/ 
210b3('bum): bu don dam pa stong pa nyid rnyed pa dang // don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
210b4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang gzhan ma yi da na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa ste// 
210b5('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dang pa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe
210b6('bum): dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dad dam pa stong pa nyid snyed pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong ba nyid
210b7('bum): nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis myed de gnyis byar byed de/ mang
210b8('bum): ldan pa shar dati nu dus byas gang pa nyid med par byor byang chub sems dpa' banig sa par myi byigasaso// sus byas stong pa nyid snang pa nyid kyi phyi nga chub sems dpa' sa gi pasar mi phyog gi/ lu
211a1('bum): nga gas so/ byas nyid sems sa grus sa dus byas tha~Mng bad sa
211a2('bum): ma kyi gas so// sa sa sa kyi sa sa smra hU~M snron sa sa
211b1('bum): yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yinapa/ 
211b2('bum): dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i
211b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
211b4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi ma dathar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong nge nyidri myed pa'i phyir/ 
211b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma 'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i
211b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
211b7('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyis
211b8('bum): so 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ci'i phyir zhe na/ dung tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med/ 
212a1('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi migs
212a2('bum): te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang / 
212a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar 'dus ma byas stong // 
212a4('bum): pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa da dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
212a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tin
212a6('bum): bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// mtha' las/ 
212a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pasto/ 
212a8('bum): pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i
212b1('bum): ma mra sa pa bya ba mabar bye rtogasas/ mag las das pasong ba nyid gang nying byeng par phyir bya chu ses tu ma mar byed byinas ma 'ams 'das pa stong pa nyid byed par byar bya chu sems dang/ 
212b2('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// mtha'
212b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa
212b4('bum): nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'a dngas pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' las 'dra/ 
212b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngam / 
212b6('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar nam
212b7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa/ 
212b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa
213a1('bum): ke sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 
213a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sran gi mthar myi dmyig so// thog ma pa
213a3('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma
213a4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid pa phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi rang dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i daphyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ thog ma dang tha ma
213a5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid skyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ra byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed
213a6('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldanas
213a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa
213a8('bum): sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thog
213b1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i man
213b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang / 
213b3('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su
213b4('bum): myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba mye da pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi ma thar myi dmyigaso// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
213b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyi da dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
213b6('bum): sngon gi mthar skye dmyigs so/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// dor bskyed pa spyong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyim mthar myi dmyigs sa// 
213b7('bum): dang bskyed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi daphyogs so// dor bamed ba sno
213b8('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sa
214a1('bum): sag dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa
214a2('bum): nyid myed pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa sa sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi
214a3('bum): te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid mye
214a4('bum): kha yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gang zhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa/ 
214a5('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin du dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa
214a6('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kya
214a7('bum): gnyis su med de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses
214a8('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
214b1('bum): myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// rang bzhin stong / 
214b2('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir bya ba/ 
214b3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
214b4('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// te de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid
214b5('bum): myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi me tha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus mi dmyigs te/ 
214b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ong gzhan ma
214b7('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid
214b8('bum): med pa gang len pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang / 
215a1('bum): dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed/ 
215a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub se sa das / 
215a3('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ 
215a4('bum): chos thams cad snang pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma 'i mthar mya dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// chos thams ca
215a5('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar/ myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang / chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
215a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs/ 
215a7('bum): dba' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chos
215a8('bum): thams cad gang ba nyid de bo nyid myed pa la spen gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mthu' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa 'ang gnan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa zhing stong pa 'i
215a9('bum): yul la/ yi nyon yang yas yang yi mtshangal 'a nga cadang / mdu bya 'dra yar ba sbo ma chu ba ba da yang ya b.rung pa 'ong che dang / ma / tshe yang si ca nag ga bya dra dag yang tho lan myi mang yadz+dza dra ma'i ba tshwa/ byan 'byung nga dgran sa sa rung ba
215b1('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
215b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos sgra/ 
215b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang
215b4('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub semangs dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
215b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig sa so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
215b6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
215b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems das
215b8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang go mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' yus myi dmyigs
216a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
216a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang rang gi mtshan nyid du bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gi mtha' myi
216a3('bum): phyi ma'i mthara' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ring gi mtshan nyid stong pa 'di dben pa lang
216a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yi na/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma
216a5('bum): yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi/ mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
216a6('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyi nga stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpe ba gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang
216a7('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
216a8('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa ni
216b1('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
216b2('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
216b3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs/ 
216b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de bus su myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir/ 
216b5('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid/ te myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mying myigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngos
216b6('bum): nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs to// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid med pa 'ang gi/ zhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
216b7('bum): yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang
216b8('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid glang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang/ 
217a1('bum): skyed sa nga/ rgyu chub se pa gang yin pa ma gsapa 'gang yin pa da kyi ma'i mapa gang yin pa dang / 'bus pa yin pa da sa sa bya
217a2('bum): ming gnyis su byor myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar gyi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
217a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems das/ 
217a4('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
217a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid na pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems das
217a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// dngos
217a7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyi don/ me dang 'a
217a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myeng pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyin
217b1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
217b2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// 
217b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
217b4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// 
217b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir bya/ ngang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid s+ho/ dang ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi
217b6('bum): dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang kha' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid da myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
217b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir bya/ 
217b8('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
217b9('bum): dmyigs// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'o// 
218a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang ngo bo nyid stong
218a2('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
218a3('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
218a4('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid me da pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
218a5('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi/ mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan
218a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chu ba sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
218a7('bum): dngas po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' son gi mthar myi dmyigaso// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos kyi
218a8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
218b1('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ 
218b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang
218b3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
218b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang rtabang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi
218b5('bum): dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin snya gi mtha' yang gzhanam
218b6('bum): yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa
