218b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang
218b8('bum): phyin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed do gnyis su byar myed do// 
219a1('bum): bam po / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
219a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed
219a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sde/ 
219a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhagar ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems sa
219a5('bum): ma ma par phyi dmyigs so/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnas byas nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' grus su
219a6('bum): skyed myigasas/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa dbed pa'i phyir byang nub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs sa// dran pa sde bar gzhag pa ni nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sus myi dmyigs sa// dem gyur ni/ 
219a7('bum): na pa cwa pa ga nag pa srong po dang / dran pa de bar gzhag pa stod dang / dun banye bar gzhag pa da pa dang / drang ba nyi ba gnag pa ga nyid byeng ba la rtson rnams kyi dz+nyAn/ 
219a8('bum): khyim ma byar gyigs sa kyi gyu sate/ shi pa gnas ma gnas sa ba nyi gzhas ming nas sa rlo na pa nan ma
219b1('bum): nye bar gnag ba ga/ cod med pa yang gzhan pa san/ byung chub sems dpa' yang gzhanas ni/ snod gi mtha' 'dag zhan ma yin/ phyi ma ma 'angan no ma na/ dbus kyang gan ma yinan/ che dang ma/ 
219b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa gang yin pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
219b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
219b4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so/ yang dag par spong/ 
219b5('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyi/ gso/ yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sem/ shes dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i
219b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myamyi dmyig so// ye dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub
219b7('bum): sems drapa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi kyi/ 
219b8('bum): so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid mye
220a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba myed pa dang yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang yang dag par spong ba
220a2('bum): dben pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag par spong ba 'ang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid
220a3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan
220a4('bum): ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang ga zhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yang dag par spong ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid
220a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa gang yin/ pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang yin pa dang / sngon go mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
220a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed do// me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gning pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
220a7('bum): dmyigaso// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ rdzu 'phrul go rkang/ 
220a8('bum): yong bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gi nang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
220b1('bum): mthar mya dmyigaso// rdzu 'phrul bti ngar myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi byang chub sems dpa' dbus su byi dmyigs// rdzu 'phrul gri dang ba dper ni
220b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ting bu rdzu 'phrul gi rkang
220b3('bum): myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi chung pa stong pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul rbagi rkang pa dben pa dang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs de
220b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phru he la gi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rka nga ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed/ 
220b5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yoni/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lngar
220b6('bum): nardzu 'phrul gi rkang pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
220b7('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po myed/ 
221a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
221a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sde
221a3('bum): dpo'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// dbang po myed/ 
221a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dbang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
221a5('bum): dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi myigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu da khang po myed pa dang dbang po stong pa nyid dang / dbang po dben pa dang dbang ba
221a6('bum): ngob nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ dbang po myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
221a7('bum): dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ snron gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhanam yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha/ 
221a8('bum): dAt+ya'i bu de ltar na dbang po myed pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / pargya 'i dben pa gang+gA yin pa dang dbung po myod pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin
221b1('bum): dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ stobs stong pa nyid
221b2('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// 
221b3('bum): stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
221b4('bum): dmyigaso// stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi nga myigaso// stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus nga su myi dmyigaso/ stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
221b5('bum): myi dmyigs so// stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang / 'a dbu su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa na ra dwa ti'i bu stobs myed pa dang stobs stong pa nyid dang stobs dben pa dang / 
221b6('bum): stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ stobs myed pa yang gzhan ma yon/ stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stobs dben pa yang gan
221b7('bum): ma yin/ stobs ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/ sngon go mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 
221b8('bum): de ltar na stobs myed pa gang yin pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa
222a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi/ 
222a2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi/ 
222a3('bum): yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
222a4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
222a5('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan la ga stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
222a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra ti'i bu/ 
222a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yag lag stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
222a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bya
222b1('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa gang yin pad/ 
222b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pad// 
222b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisasu med de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
222b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyi da kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
222b5('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi ma thar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed
222b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa
222b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mye
222b8('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir
223a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
223a2('bum): ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid
223a3('bum): myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyang
223a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben dpa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dpa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yon/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
223a5('bum): gnanam yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mang tha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra ga ti'i bu de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya dang / 
223a6('bum): myed pa gang yod pa dang / 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa su
223a7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myong de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar
223a8('bum): dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
223b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
223b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
223b3('bum): dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa
223b4('bum): bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub se dmas dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid/ 
223b5('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bde na pa myed pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang 'phags pa'i
223b6('bum): bden pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden
223b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzha
223b8('bum): ma yid/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
224a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
224a2('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chu/ 
224a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// / 
224a4('bum): bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sde
224a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigaso// 
224a6('bum): bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sos/ 
224a7('bum): dpa dbus su myi dmyigs s+ho// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shir dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan myed pa dang bsam gtan stong pa nyid dang / thasam gtan dben pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mapa rgya
224a8('bum): kyigs kyis ngom kyi dmyigs / dngos myi byig / bsam gtan myed pa yang gnan ma yin/ thasam gtan myeng pa nyid kyang gzhanan meng/ thamam gtan chen pa yangs yin/ pasam gtan ga / 
224b1('bum): mngag zhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gnan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ngas
224b2('bum): gtan myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi maH
224b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis mar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 
224b4('bum): so// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi ma thar myi dmyigaso// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems 'das dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
224b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad mye med pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi myigaso// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma/ 
224b6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang
224b7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid
224b8('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad myed pa myed pa dang / tshad myed pa stong pa nyid dang / tshad myed pa dben pa dang tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi
225a1('bum): can mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs te/ chang myed pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin tshad myed pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin tshad myed pa dzin
225a2('bum): nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chang myed pa gang / 
225a3('bum): yin pa dang / tshad myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa snang be ba gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa bo ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
225a4('bum): pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
225a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sos
225a6('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
225a7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang / 
225a8('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed / 
225b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i/ 
225b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bug / 
225b3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed/ 
225b4('bum): la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed/ yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa
225b5('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
225b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa/ 
225b7('bum): dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 
225b8('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa/ 
226a1('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
226a2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 
226a3('bum): rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
226a4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa med pa'i rnga phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar dad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// 
226a5('bum): rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang / pa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa/ 
226a6('bum): ti'i bu rnam par thar pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par/ 
226a7('bum): thar pa myed pa yang gzhon ma yin/ rnam par gyur pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yon/ rnam par thar ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma ni/ 
226a8('bum): sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par thar pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa / 
226b1('bum): rnam pas nga pa gang yi pa dang rnam pa sa ba dru nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chu ba sems dpa' gang min pa dang / sun gamam gang yin pa dang phyi ma mtha' gang yin pa dang dus gang yin pa dems cad
226b2('bum): kyang gnyis su myed gnyis byar myed do// me dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong / 
226b3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugs
226b4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
226b5('bum): par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi/ dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dpe/ na ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// mthar
226b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub se/ mas dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su/ 
226b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
226b8('bum): dbus su myi dmyigaso/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
227a1('bum): par 'jug pa myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
227a2('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
227a3('bum): 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i yang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
227a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'angag zhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang / dgazhan no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa
227a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gangang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa
227a6('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de bas
227a7('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rna ba
227a8('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dben pa'i
227b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
227b2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshon ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa stong pa
227b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// rna pas
227b4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa/ 
227b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
227b6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa
227b7('bum): myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / rnam pa/ 
227b8('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
228a1('bum): myed pa dang smon pa med pa la ngo bo nyid myed pa lang sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa
228a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa dben pa yang gzhan
228a3('bum): ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang / 
228a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i
228a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma spyod pa dang smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang yi na pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed de dang smin pa myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
228a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
228a7('bum): gnyis su skyed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' ldan/ 
228a8('bum): gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngod gi mthar myi dmyigaso// mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma
228b1('bum): par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
228b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dbyinas/ 
228b3('bum): mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byung
228b4('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mo// dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa dang mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed/ 
228b5('bum): pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbu sa myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin no// 
228b6('bum): mngon par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gan/ 
228b7('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mngon par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang mngon par shepa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
228b8('bum): mngon par shes pa ji nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mthara' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis phye
229a1('bum): gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
229a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
229a3('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin // 
229a4('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su/ myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sem
229a5('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yusu myi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
229a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
229a7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin ting nge 'dzin dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin byang chub seMs/ 
229a8('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gnan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin myed pa gang yin pa dang ting nge 'dzin ste
229b1('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
229b2('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
229b3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mying
229b4('bum): so// gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sem sa dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo dben
229b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzung sa kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir byang chub
229b6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// gzungs kyi
229b7('bum): sgo ngo bo nyid byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgro stong pa nyid dang gzungs kyi sgo dben pa dang gzungs
229b8('bum): kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mthara' myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin gzungs kyis
230a1('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
230a2('bum): yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgong po nyid
230a3('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin du dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe nga
230a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dadwa ti bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin ji gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa
230a5('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gsheg nges pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar / dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
230a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
230a7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
230a8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub so sodas/ 
230b1('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyis
230b2('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa
230b3('bum): stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyang
230b4('bum): gzhan ma yin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed dpa yang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
230b5('bum): sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' ya nga gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti 'i bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa gang yin pa da
230b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i maH
230b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ myi 'jig
230b8('bum): pastong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sod gi mthar myi dmyigs sa/ myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngo go mthar myo daphyogs so// myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid spyod pa'i phyir bya chub
231a1('bum): gdapa' gron gi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dbyigan
231a2('bum): myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sde
231a3('bum): dpang dbus su myi dmyigs so// mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid / 
231a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mi 'jigs pa myed pa dang / myi nya dajigs pa stong pa nyid dang myi 'jigs pa dben pa dang / myi 'jigs
231a5('bum): pa rnga na nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyi gas dbus myi dmyigs te/ myi 'jigs pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin myi 'jigs
231a6('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzha/ 
231a7('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myi 'jigs pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa dben pa gang yin pa dang myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin/ 
231a8('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
231b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// so so yang dag par rig
231b2('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sman gi mthar myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir bya / 
231b3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i man+ta/ 
231b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// so sa yang dag pa dar rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs sa// 
231b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa snang ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'ang khrus su myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// so so yang dag
231b6('bum): rig pa dom nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs sa/ de tso'i byor zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa med pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang so so la
231b7('bum): dag par rig pa dben pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa yang gzhan ma yin sa so yang dag
231b8('bum): par rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin du
232a1('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rigag
232a2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
232a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs sa/ 
232a4('bum): snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon/ gi mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub/ sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
232a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar gyi dmigs so// skye nga rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
232a6('bum): dmyigasas/ snying rje chen po dber pa phying bya chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so/ snying rje chen po po 'i nyidi myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir/ 
232a7('bum): byung chub sems dpa' dngas su myi dmyigs/ snyi rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po / 
232a8('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dngo' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ medang ldan shar dA ti bu snying rje chen po myed pa dang snang rje chen po stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po dben pa dang snying rje chen po na mi
232b1('bum): myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ snying rje chen po myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin snying rje chen po dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
232b2('bum): snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' yang gnan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
232b3('bum): bu de ltar na snying rje chen po myed pa gang yin pa dang snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
232b4('bum): sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myi do/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir/ 
232b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir
232b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nga bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
232b7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
232b8('bum): rabang byam ming tur phyog po/ mas rgyas kyims ma dres pa de nyid byed pa byor bya chub sems dpang phyi ma sasar tu phyog so// sangs rgyas kyi chos pa dres pa byed par gyi byang chu sems dpa / 
233a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
233a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa
233a3('bum): nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
233a4('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
233a5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ na gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yi na dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
233a6('bum): na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid
233a7('bum): ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i/ 
233a8('bum): bu chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa'
233b1('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// chos kyi dbyin
233b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa/ 
233b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyis myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir
233b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi dbyings myed pa
233b5('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / sa kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos kyi dbyings myed/ 
233b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
233b7('bum): sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chos kyi dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin
233b8('bum): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yi/ 
234a1('bum): de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
234a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 
234a3('bum): so// de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems/ 
234a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ra byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ de bzhin/ nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
234a5('bum): de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyi gas so// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyig so// de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
234a6('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid myed pa dang de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa dang de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha
234a7('bum): myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
234a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na de bzhin nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
234b1('bum): de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
234b2('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa
234b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
234b4('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir byang chu dab sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i na tha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyis
234b5('bum): so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so yang dag pa'i/ 
234b6('bum): mtha' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi
234b7('bum): dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs sa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i yang dag pa'i mthar myed pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang yang
234b8('bum): pa'i mtha' dben pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong
235a1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha'
235a2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yangag wAn ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa/ 
235a3('bum): dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
235a4('bum): 'bus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ke nen yang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dngas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi/ 
235a5('bum): dmyigs/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sa mas dpa' sngon gimathar myir myig so/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gim
235a6('bum): mye myig so// byasam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// ngas/ 
235a7('bum): gyis kyi khye ma'i dbyangongs stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs sa/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gyis myi khyab pas
235a8('bum): dbyibyes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang / 
235b1('bum): chub semasu dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dang
235b2('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bsam gyis
235b3('bum): rmyi lum pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stom
235b4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa yang ga/ zhan ma yin bsam gyis myi khyab rtsa ba'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa yang da gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
235b5('bum): sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i ramatha' yang gzhan ma yin/ de bus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang bas
235b6('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon
235b7('bum): gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha grang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed do/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
235b8('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'in
236a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
236a2('bum): nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub semasadapa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dubus
236a3('bum): su myi dmyigs so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dang/ 
236a4('bum): dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti/ da'i bu nyan thos myed pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dpe na pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs
236a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ nyan thos myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa
236a6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nyan/ 
236a7('bum): thos myed pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin papa
236a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon ga
236b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas ngon
236b2('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// rang sangs rgyas skyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/ 
236b3('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rang sangs rgyas
236b4('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang
236b5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir bya/ nga chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas myed pa dang / rang sangs/ 
236b6('bum): rgyas stong pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang rang sangs rgyas nga bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mthu' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
236b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' yang
236b8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rang sangs rgyas myed pa gang yin pa dang rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
237a1('bum): ga byed pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de banyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang son gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis myed de gnyis byar byed do// 
237a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// byang chub seMs/ 
237a3('bum): dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
237a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stong de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs sobyang nu ba sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'im tha
237a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byung chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ byang chum
237a6('bum): sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
237a7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ro da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' myong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong po nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa dang / byang chub sems
237a8('bum): dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' myod pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bya dum
237b1('bum): sems dpa' dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ snron gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gnamapa
237b2('bum): yin// dbus kyang kun nam yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
237b3('bum): byang chub ses dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang lus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis byar skye
237b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// tha ma sa cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
237b5('bum): myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' son gi mthar myi dmyigs/ 
237b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben/ 
237b7('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbur
237b8('bum): dbus kyi phyogs/ thams cad mkhyed pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dayus kyi dmyigs/ thams cad ma byed pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bus myi dmyigs/ zas cad mkhyen pa nyi nga ba nyid myong
238a1('bum): nga byang chub sems dpa gas su myi dmyigs ng+ge ca bya sbyin nang ldan bshar da ti'i bu thams cad mabyon pa nyid byed pa dang / thams cad pa byed pa nyid stong pa nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i
238a2('bum): dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyed pa nyid nga pa nyid myed pa la ston gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mthara' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te thas cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid
238a3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' yang
238a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
238a5('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pagang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin/ ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin/ 
238a6('bum): pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
238a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigs so// gas pa kham po
238a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 
238b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe drang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'ong lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gri mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs
238b2('bum): te mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs kyi sngon ga mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus
238b3('bum): myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am 'bus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang / 
238b4('bum): yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
238b5('bum): 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi mni mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kum tu mtha'ayas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra/ 
238b6('bum): dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba sngon gyi mtha' myi myigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyide la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu na
238b7('bum): grangs des na tshor ba kun tu mtha'i yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpe' kun tu mtha' yas// 
238b8('bum): rig par bya zhes zer bya ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dbor na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs
239a1('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du shes sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ 
239a2('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang
239a3('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
239a4('bum): 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigasaphyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas ku don tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan
239a5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du byed kyi sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus rgya/ dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// 
239a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 
239a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi
239a8('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi
239b1('bum): phyir rnam par shes pa'i sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa
239b2('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer
239b3('bum): ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi mi'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas ku/ 
239b4('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang lnga na pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de ban du myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
239b5('bum): stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' bar rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di
239b6('bum): skad du ci'i phyir na/ rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sem sa dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan po sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
239b7('bum): 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes myong du brjod do/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
239b8('bum): de bzhin du rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rnab
240a1('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas/ 
240a2('bum): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i ma/ 
240a3('bum): myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir sA'i sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha'/ 
240a4('bum): myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbusami dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// / sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
240a5('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha 'ayas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa rjod
240a6('bum): bu lce ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas
240a7('bum): ba'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce'i sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha/ 
240a8('bum): 'am dbus myi dmyig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na lus
240b1('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na namaH/ 
240b2('bum): la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyig dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du lus stong pa
240b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir lus kyi sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lus kun
240b4('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir
240b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid ni nam mkha' dang ma/ nyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha'
