263a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa/ 
263a7('bum): nyid la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myang ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la brtson 'grus
263b1('bum): kyipha rolab du phyin pa myang byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan ga pha rol tu phyin dpa
263b2('bum): mying byang chub sems dpa' myod de/ shes rabakyo pa rol tu byanang pa ni shes rab kyi po 'ang tu nad pas spang ste/ ngaci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la shos rab kyi pa'i mang du phyin pa spang byang num sems dpa'o / 
263b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang / nang snang ba nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de co'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nang snang ba nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' med do/ phyi stong po nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi
263b4('bum): song ste ni de ci'i phyir zhe ni stong pa nyid la phyi snang pa nyid myang byang chu sems dpa' myed do// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi nang snang pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir na na/ stong pa nyid la phyi nang snang po ring
263b5('bum): myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong / pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myeng byang chub sems dpa'
263b6('bum): myed do// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po sna stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi stong
263b7('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid myeng byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus
263b8('bum): byas stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed byang chub
264a1('bum): sems dpa' myed de/ mtha' las sa paso nyid nim tha mas las padang da kya sku 'byor nan/ zung rnamams 'as pa mung bya chu skyen
264a2('bum): dpa' myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid myang byang chub sems dpa' myong / 
264a3('bum): dor myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid myong byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong
264a4('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong po nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myong byang chub sems dpa' med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid da ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
264a5('bum): stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid myong byang chub sems / dpa' myed do// rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gyi mtsha nyid kyis ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang gi/ 
264a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong
264a7('bum): stong pa nyid mang byang chub sems dpa' myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong po nyid myed byang chu
264a8('bum): sems dpa' myang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpo' myed do/ dngos po myed pa'i
264b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
264b2('bum): gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed/ byang chub ma sems dpa' myed do// yang dag par spong
264b3('bum): ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par spong ba rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis/ 
264b4('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed de/ byang chub sems dpa' myang ngo // dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dbang po
264b5('bum): rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ stobs rnams/ ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ stong pa nyi nyid la stobs rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myang ngo // byang chub
264b6('bum): kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan log rnams kyis stong ste/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' med do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
264b7('bum): pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' myod de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags
264b8('bum): pa'i bdan pa rnam stong ste/ ra ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myong / bsam gautan rnams ni bsamo gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ da ci'i phyir
265a1('bum): sdug pa stong ba nyid la bsam gtan rnams myed byang nub sems dpa' gyud do// mang byed pa rnams na mad byed pa rnams kyis spyong bye dba'i phyir nan/ stong ba nyid dang myed pa rnams myang byang chub sems par/ 
265a2('bum): skyed de/ gzugs myed pa'i sems par 'dug pa rnams ni// gzugs myed po'i skams par 'jug pa rnams kyis slong ste/ ro ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myo po'i sems par 'jug pa rnams med/

265a4('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dgus stong ste/ de ci'i phyizhe na/ stong pa nyid la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

265b1('bum): de zhi gshegs pa'i stongs rnams ni bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ stong ba nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams myang byang chub sems dpa' myed de/ myi 'jigs

266b7('bum): myang myi tshugs / dod ldan po ga ba'i myigan myig le mangs myi dmyigs sa/ myog non pos mya nga myi dmyigs so// rnab ni rnab la skyeng ci myi myigasu du rdzun ni phyogs
266b8('bum): rba dmyigs/ myig dang na bani sde la myang ci myi dmyigs so// sngon myog nga pa la myang cing mo myigs so// phyog dongon pa dang ldan gyi la mying cing myo rgya nas so/ lha ni sde ma rgya
267a1('bum): ga dmyigs so lce ni myig dang rnarnga ba dang snga la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig dang rna ba dang snga dang lce ni lus la myed cing myi dmyigs saso/ lus ni lus la myed cing myi dmyigasaso// lus ni myig dang rna ba dang sA du lce la
267a2('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus ni yid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ yid ni yid la myed cing myi dmyigs/ yid ni myig dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus la myed cing myo dmyigs
267a3('bum): gzugs ni gzugs la myod cing myi dmyigs/ sgra ni sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sgra ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs/ gzugs dang sgra ni dri la myed cing myi dmyigs// dri na dri la myed cing myi dmyigs / dri
267a4('bum): ni gzugs dang sgra la myed cing mi dmyigs so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so// ro ni ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so rkang ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmyigs so// gzugs

267b1('bum): mags pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing mi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes/ ma

268a1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni snga'i 'dus te rag pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te rag pa ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa myad cing myi dmyigs sa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi

268a3('bum): t+ya/ dus ga pas ma gsos/ lce sa ga khyog+sa ga dus na 'i lus ga sa nga po rlogs pa/ phyag na

269b7('bum): dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa myed cing mi dmyigs/ ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la myed cing mi dmigaso/ skye mched drug ni skye mched drug myed cing myi dmyigaso/ 
269b8('bum): skye drug ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang nam por shes pa dang mying dang gzugs la med cing myi dmyigs so/ ma rig pa dang 'du byang dang rnam par shes pa dang myang dang gzugs dang / skye mchod drug ni reg pa la myong cing myi dmyi
270a1('bum): reg pa ni reg pa med cing mi dmyigs so// reg pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang skye mched drug la med cing mi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dang 'du byed

270a3('bum): dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa la myed cing mi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba ni sred pa
270a4('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sred pa ni sred pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sred pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang reg pa dang /

270a6('bum): dmyigs so// len po ni la nad pa la myed cing myi dmyigs// la nad pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang mying dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa la myad cing myi dmyigs
270a7('bum): ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang mying dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang lon pa ni srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigaso// srid pa ni srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// srid
270a8('bum): pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa la med cing myi dmigaso// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs
270b1('bum): dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang le nad pa dang srid pa ni skye ba la med cing mi dmigs so// skye ba ni skye ba myed cing myi dmyigs so// skye ba ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang mying dang / 
270b2('bum): gzugs dang sgra mched drug dang rag pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang mying dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang A.A/ reg pa dang tshor ba
270b3('bum): rang srang ba dang la nad pa dang sring pa dang skye ba ni gshi la myeng cing myi dmyigs so// shi ni na shi la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gshi na ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mying dang gzugs dang skye mched
270b4('bum): dang rag pa dang tshor ba dang srid pa dang lend pa dang srid pa dang skye ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rnan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sbyin
270b5('bum): ba'i pha lang tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa sa myeng cing ma dmyigs su rdul khrims kyi pa'i lang du pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// chu lo khrims kyi pat+tA ma hU~M
270b6('bum): nga 'a rgya na ya ra sa khyo la su kyi tshug da sa rkyen pa dang / rdul sa ma tu tho pa
270b7('bum): cing mi dmyigs sa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bzod pa'o sa rim rjo rnad pa btsun po'i pha rom tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// brjod
271a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myed cing myi dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
271a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol du tu phyind pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam
271a3('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni
271a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol dab tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol
271a5('bum): tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinod pa ni shes rab kyis
271a6('bum): ralang tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pa ling tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myang cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa/ 
271a7('bum): ngang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la med cing myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid ni nang snying po nyid la med cing myi dmyigs
271a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigaso// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong
271b1('bum): nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa
271b2('bum): nyid ni dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigaso/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

275a1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

275a6('bum): yan lag rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'grol gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stabs rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /

275a8('bum): spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gri rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stabs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myang cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden po rnams ni 'phags pa'i bde pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs//

275b2('bum): cing myi dmyis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// med myed pa rnams ni mang myed pa rnams la myed cing mi dmyigs so/ tshad myang ba rnams ni
275b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bdon pa dang bsam gtan dang / na chad med pa rnams ni gzugs myang po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myang cing myi rgya
275b4('bum): byu pa'i rnams par jug pa sus na namyed pa'i rnams par 'jug mas la rgyas kyi gzunas pa 'dun pa ma sa
275b5('bum): kyis pam pa mapa la dus pa mam rgya na chu rgyag sa sa gas 'as ma sa
