276a2('bum): mi dmyigs so mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad myang ba dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams
276a3('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshang myang ba dang / gzugs myang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nas
276a4('bum): ni rnam par tharang pa'i sgo rnams la myed cing myi dmyigaso// rnam par tha ra pa'i sgra rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang chad myang ba dang / gzugs myang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
276a5('bum): tha rad pa dang mtha rad pa dang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad myang ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i
276a6('bum): sems par 'jug pa dang rnam par 'du ba dang mas rang kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par tha da pa te rnams na mngon pa nas pa rnams la myang cing myi dmyigs pa/ 
276a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnam par ni mngon par shes par rnams la mang dmyi dmyigs so/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bdin ba dang / bsam gtan dang chang myed pa dang / gzugs myang ba
276a8('bum): skams par 'jug pa dang / rnam par gas tha rad pa dang / mthor dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la myad cir myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam g+ha/ 
276a9('bum): dang tshad myed pa dang gzugs myang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / tha rang pa'i sgo dang / mngon por shes pa rnams ni ting nge 'dzind rnams la myed cing myi
276b1('bum): so ting nge 'dzin rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang chang myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thard pa dang / 
276b2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo ni mngon par shes pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzungs
276b3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa rgya dang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzind rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
276b4('bum): myed cing mi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rna mas la myed cing mi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phagades pa'i bden pa'i dang / bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzug
276b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par tha rad pa dang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzind rnams la mang
276b6('bum): cang myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ngo bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la myong ci
276b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams nimyi 'jigs pa rnams la myad cing myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs la myed cing myi dmyigaso// de bzhin gshegs
276b8('bum): po'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rna mos ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig
276'a1('bum): k+ku pa rnam pa ning 'di gshegs pa slobs du su 'jigs pa rnams pa myang cing myi dmyigs sa de bzhi gshegs pa'i skabs dang myi 'jigs pa dang / ma mo yang dag pa 'jig pa rnams nis sa rgyas kya / 
276'a2('bum): ngang ma 'dres pa rnams la med cing myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigaso
276'a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la myed cing myi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myed/ 
276'a4('bum): cing myi dmyigs so// rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi dasa'i chos mas la myed cing myi dmyigaso// rigs kyi sa'i tshe/ sa rnams ni brgyad pa'i sa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs
276'a5('bum): brgyad po'i sa'i chos rnams ni brgyad pa'i sa'i chos rnams la mying cing myi dmyigs so/ brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs// rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / 
276'a6('bum): brgyang pa'i chas rnams ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing myi dmyigs so/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ rgyun tu zhugs pa
276'a7('bum): chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa chas dang / brgyad pa'i sa'i chos rnams lo myed cing myi dmyigs so/ rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni lan cig phyir 'ong da
276'a8('bum): chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigaso/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams na rigs kyi sa ri
276'b1('bum): chos rnams dang / brgyad pa'i cha sa'i chos dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos
276'b2('bum): rnams ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang
276'b3('bum): brgyad pa'i chos dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rigs kyi sa'i chos dang brgyad pa'i sa'i chos dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir
276'b4('bum): 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa/ 'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 
276'b5('bum): dgra bcom pa yi chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang brgyad pa'isa'i chos dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'a'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing myi myigs
276'b6('bum): so so'i skye bo ni sa so so'i skye bo 'o sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyis ni brgyad pa'i sa la myang cing myi dmyigs/ 
276'b7('bum): brgyad pa'i sa ni brgyad pa'i so la myed cing myi dmyigs/ brgyad pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa'i la myed cing myi dmyigs so// so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sra ni mthong
276'b8('bum): ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// mthong ba'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs/ mthong ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigaso// so so'i skye
277a1('bum): chos migs kyis rang rgyang ba'i sa dang mang ba'i sal skye tshong ma dbugs so/ seMs sa sonas nga rdzogs kyis nga rgyang can pa mthang du/ pa 'i 'a chags da
277a2('bum): sa la myed cing myi dmyigs/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmyigs/ 'dod chags dang bral sa ni sa so'i skye bo'o sa dang / rigs kyis rang brgyad pa'i sa dang / 
277a3('bum): mthong ba'i sa dang / bslabs pa'i sa la med cings la myed cing myi dmigaso// so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 
277a4('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la myed ci mi dmyigs so// byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni byas pa'i rtogs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmyigaso/ byas pa rtog pa'i sa ni sa
277a5('bum): so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang / bslabs pa'o sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang
277a6('bum): mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa'i rtogs pa'i sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
277a7('bum): sa la myed cing myi dmyigaso// rang sangs rgyas kyis ni sa so'i skye ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis r+b+ba dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong po'i sro dang / bslabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'o/ 
277b1('bum): sa dang byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas
277b2('bum): po rtog pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la myod cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni
277b3('bum): so so'i skye ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems
277b4('bum): dpa'i ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs
277b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i// sau dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa
277b6('bum): dang byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la myad cing myi dmyigaso// thams cad shes pa nyid ma thams cad shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// thams
277b7('bum): cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing myi dmyigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes po nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myang cang myi dmyigs/ lam gyi rngam po shes pa nyid ni thams
277b8('bum): cad shes pa nyid la med cing myi dmyigs so// thams cad shes pa nyid dang lam gyi rnam shes pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la myod cing myi dmyigaso/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
278a1('bum): pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la med cing myi dmyigs so/ rgyun tu
278a2('bum): zhugs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba lo myed cing myi dmyigs/ lan
278a3('bum): cig phyir 'ang ba ni rgyun tu zhugaso pa la myod cing myi dmyigs sa/ rgyu can tu zhugs pa dang / lano cog phyir 'ong bo la myed cing mi dmyigs so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i ni/ phyir myi 'ang ba la myong cing myi dmyigs
278a4('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba lamyeng cid myi dmyigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lanadag phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba ni dgra bcom pa la myang
278a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa ni dgra bcom pa la myed cing mi rim gos so// dgra bcom pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan tu ga phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs// 
278a6('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas la myed cing myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rangs
278a7('bum): rgyas ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa la med cing myi dmyigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom
278a8('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed ring mya dmyig so// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la myang cing myi dmigs/ byang chub mams dpa' ni rgya ma tu tshu gos pa dang / lan cig
278b1('bum): dbyir 'ong ba dang phyir myi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas la myed cing myi dmigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dngarang sangs rgyas dang / byang
278b2('bum): chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la myed cing myi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig
278b3('bum): phyir 'ong ba dang phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs/ byang chub
278b4('bum): sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myed cing myi dmyig so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la myang cing myi dmyigaso/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
278b5('bum): phyi nad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmigs so// byang / chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gdams shing rje su bstand pa la med cing myi dmyigs/ gdams
278b6('bum): shing rje su bstand pa ni gdams shing rjes su bston pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gdams shing rjes su bstand pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigaso/ tshe
278b7('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar chos thams cad ni myed cing myi dmyigs so// myed pas byang chub sems dpa' myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'ang skad du ci'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ 
278b8('bum): byang chub sems dpyal zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam yin no// zhos zor ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sho ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar s+ho/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du brtags pa ste/ rdo ci'i phyir na'i/ 
279a1('bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed zhes bya ba dang / 
279a2('bum): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du brtags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin
279a3('bum): tshor ba ma yin de ni 'du shes pa ma yin/ de ni 'du byed ma yin de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ nga'i
279a4('bum): phyir na 'di lta ste sa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste myig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya ba
279a5('bum): dang / lus zhes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba dang 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang tu nga myi 'gro/ gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba
279a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin/ de ni rna ba ma yin/ de ni sna ma yin/ de ni lce ma yin/ de ni lus ma yin/ de ni yod ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni myong gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong
279a7('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lto ste gzugs zhes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba
279a8('bum): dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang ga reg ces bya ba dang / chos shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'go gang na yang mi gnas/ ming
279b1('bum): tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin de ni snga ma yin de ni dri ma yin/ da ni ri ma yin/ da ni reg ma yin/ de ni chos ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni myong gyi rang bzhin gyis stong / stong pa gang
279b2('bum): yin pa de ni ma yin te/ de'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig gi rnam por shes pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par
279b3('bum): shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang da sa kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btag/ 
279b4('bum): pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang myi 'o gang tu yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni myig gyi rnam par shes pa ma yin da ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i rnam par
279b5('bum): shes pa ma yin don lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi yin de ni yod kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myong ni myong rgya rang bzhin gyis stong // 
279b6('bum): snang ba gang yin padan myong sa yin te/ ra'i phyir 'dis s+ho/ chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'ad ni myo sa zhes bya rang ldan na buM 'dzin / phyag gi 'dus pa ra
279b7('bum): zhes bya ba dang na d+ha'i zhus kyi rig pa zhes bya ba dang / sngal drom te dag pa zhes bya dang / lce'i 'dus te rig pa zhes byang dang / lus kyi lus te ga pa nas bya'o// yod kyi 'dus te dag pa zhes
279b8('bum): 'dod pasu bya leg pa pa/ yod sa nga na ga das kyi tshu ga dum rgya 'grag sa phyogs so// som na rgya ma po na pa phyog ni chu ma to na pasan/ dodon pa'i sus
280a1('bum): ma yin de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gyi
280a2('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg
280a3('bum): pa'i rgyan dkyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te rag pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nos bya ba dang / lus
280a4('bum): kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang yid kyi 'dus / reg pa'i rgyand kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba'i ngano glo mur du mying du bdags te pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gra
280a5('bum): gang na yang myi gnas so/ myong tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa don myi ga ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ doni rna ba'i 'du sa te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshar ba ma yod/ de ni snga'i 'dus te rag
280a6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshar nga ma yin nga ni lcelo chus te ga pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin da ni lus kyi 'dus te rag pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus rtorin pa'i rgyan kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ 
280a7('bum): phyib nan/ 'dadi sngar myi ngon myed kyi rang bzhin gyis srung gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa ni myong tsam yin te/ rang rgya'i 'dis ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nas bya ba 'dzini myo nam zhes bya'o// chengang ldan
280a8('bum): sa la sa sa tshul sa kyi / tshul sa rgya rdzos
280b1('bum): shes pa'i khams nas byab 'ang glo dung du phung du dadags pa ste/ 'ong ltar myong ni gang nas kyang mA~M 'gro gang na yang myi gnas/ mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ma'i khams ma yin/ de ni ru'i khams
280b2('bum): ma yin/ de ni mye'i khams ma yin/ da ni rlung gi khams ma yin/ nga ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ don rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myong ni mying gyi rang bzhin gyis stong / 
280b3('bum): stong ba gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / 
280b4('bum): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / mying dang gzugs shes bya ba dang / skye mched drug ces bya ba dang / reg pa zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dang / len pa zhes bya ba dang / srid
280b5('bum): pa zhes bya ba dang skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro gang du yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes
280b6('bum): bya ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin 'du byed ma yin de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin/ de ni skye mched drug ma yin/ de ni reg pa yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ nga ni sring po ma yin
280b7('bum): de ni lend pa ma yin de ni sred pa ma yin/ de ni skye ba ma yin de ni rga shi ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // snang ba gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir
280b8('bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam zhes bya'o/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'din te skyes te ming la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po myed
281a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha roso tu byin pa la yang mying myed do// deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myong gang yin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myang cing myi dmyigs/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub
281a2('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'dzin myi ma mo// 'di lto s+ho/ nus khrims kyib seMng tu phyin pa 'di ni phyis ma ste/ rlung la yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du tsun du pa myod/ rdul khrims kyi pa yong tu phyin pa la yo da/ 
281a3('bum): deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myong gang yin pa de ni/ rdul khrims kyi nga ro long tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myu myigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong rnam mo// 
281a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha ro yong tu phyin pa 'di ni myong tsam ste/ mo yang bzod pa'i pha mang du phyin pa skyod/ brjong pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la yang myong myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
281a5('bum): mying ging yon dang / zad pa'i pa chos phyin po gang yin gnyis gas myed tsa myi myonas te// de phyir 'di lta ste/ byang nub sems dkrol nas ng+ge ba 'din myongasamam/ 'ang
281a6('bum): ste/ btsun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'din myong tsam ste// brtson 'grus kyi pa long tu phyi nang pos med / brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa la yang mying myong / de co'i phyir na no// 'di ltar mying
281a7('bum): yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan
281a8('bum): gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myong / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste mying gang yin pa dang / 
281b1('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing mi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ 
281b2('bum): mying la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka ya
281b3('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ mying la yang nang stong pa nyid myed nang stong pa nyid la yang mying myeng/ 
281b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myong grang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyira'i da lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam ma
281b5('bum): 'di lta ste phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang phyi stong pa nyid myed/ phyi stong pa nyid la yang mying myod / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
281b6('bum): gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta ste phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang phyi nang stong pa nyid myed
281b7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myodang cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
281b8('bum): 'od ni myong tsam mo/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid snang pa nyid ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang myong myed do// de ci'i phyir na no// 'od ltar ming gang yin pa/ 
282a1('bum): dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta ste chen po stong pa nyid 'din
282a2('bum): mying tsam ste/ mying la yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 
282a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam mo/ 'di lta ste don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ mying la yang don dam pa stong pa nyid myed / don ram po stong pa nyid la yang mying myed // dekyi ma nan/ 
282a4('bum): 'odi ltar mying gang yin pa dang / don dam po stong pa nyid gang yin pa de / gnyis ka yang mang cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di ltar ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta
282a5('bum): ste 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste de mying la yang 'dus kyi sa stong pa nyid myed 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// phyir ni ni/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong
282a6('bum): da gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// nga'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam/ 'di lta ste/ 'dus ma byas stong po nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying lo yang lun
282a7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid myeng 'dus ma bya'o mang nyid la yang mying myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lngar ming gang yin po dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yon mganyis gsang myang cing myi dmyigs to// dbya byor ni
282a8('bum): 'od lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'idi ni myong tsam so// 'di lha ste mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid ni myong tsam ste/ myal yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
282b1('bum): pa nyid la yang mying myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ 
282b2('bum): 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta ste thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myeng / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir na
282b3('bum): na 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsamo/ 'di lta ste/ dor ba me/ 
282b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang
282b5('bum): yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing mi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di ltar ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam mo/ 'di lta ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang
282b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang phyir myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myong gang yin
282b7('bum): pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad stong po nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ mying la yang chos thams
282b8('bum): cad stong pa nyid myed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang mying med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ 
283a1('bum): de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ rang gi chen nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ mying la yang rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
283a2('bum): la yang myeng myed rdo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo
283a3('bum): 'di ltar ste myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa de ning / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
283a4('bum): gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// da lta ste dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming
283a5('bum): la yang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying mya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yod
283a6('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ mying la yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying / 
283a7('bum): myed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myong gang yin pa dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta ste/ 
283a8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ myi la yang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / 
283b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ 
283b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur ming du btags pa ste/ mying la yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
283b3('bum): myed dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub
283b4('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu da lta ste yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mi dradu brtags pa ste/ myang la yang yang dag par spong ba rjes
283b5('bum): myed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa de gnyis gang yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// de'i phyir/ 
283b6('bum): 'di ltar ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo buru du btags pa ste/ mying la yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
283b7('bum): pa rnams myed/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnam sa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir
283b8('bum): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la yang dbang po rnams myed/ rabang
284a1('bum): po rnams la mying med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni
284a2('bum): mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ stobs rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo ga bur du ming du btags pa ste/ mying la yang stabs rnams myed / stobs rnams la yang myang myed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
284a3('bum): ming gang yin pa dang / skabs rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'od lha ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ byang chuchu
284a4('bum): yan lag rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ myong la yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myang / byang chub kyi yan lag/ rnams la yang mying med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang
284a5('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sa mas dpa' 'di ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
284a6('bum): lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ mang la yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang myi myed do// 
284a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam/ 
284a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myeng / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yang
284b1('bum): du tu myo ga yi da rnams ga na pa da gnyis gas myang bya kyi byang chu sems dang nas byang 'dun gyi ma
284b2('bum): ngang sngon shar dwa to'i bu 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du brtags pa ste/ mying la yang bsam gtan rnams myed bsam gtan rnams la yang mying mya / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying
284b3('bum): gang yin pa dang bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste na chang myeng pa rnams
284b4('bum): bya ba 'ang na glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ myi nga la yang tshad myed do/ rnams myed/ tshad myed pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i// phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams gang
284b5('bum): yon pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te// de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa she ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs
284b6('bum): shes bya ba 'di ni glo buro du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mying myang ngo // de'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltarari myang gang
284b7('bum): yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ rnam par tha da pa
284b8('bum): rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du btags pa ste/ mying la yang rnam par tha rad pa rnams myang / rnam par tha rid pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myong gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams
285a1('bum): gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
285a2('bum): bar 'jug pa dag zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang ming myo
285a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar mying gang yin pa da dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myeng cang myi dmyig/ sa te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ 
285a4('bum): 'di ni chul mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ rnam par tha ra po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myang ba dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags po ste/ 
285a5('bum): mying la yang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo rnams myed rnam par thar pa'i sgron mas la yang mying myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
285a6('bum): myed dang / smon pa myed pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'ang ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ mngon par
285a7('bum): shes pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ mying la yang mngon par shes pa rnams myang / mngon par shes pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ad ltar mying gang yin pa dang
285a8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsa mo mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ang lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin
285b1('bum): rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur dmying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang ting nge 'dzind myed ting nge 'dzind rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dadang / ting nge 'dzinang rnams gang yin pa
285b2('bum): de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du
285b3('bum): mying du btags pa ste mying la yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang ming myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi rimyigs
285b4('bum): to/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ myib la yang
285b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa// bas rnams la yang mying med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ra mying gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rjes
285b6('bum): gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes pa
285b7('bum): ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ mying la yang myi 'jigs pa rnams myong / myi 'jigs pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams glang ldan
285b8('bum): de gnyis ka yang myod cing myo daphyogs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsa mo/ tshod ngo ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ sa sa yang dag par rig pa bani zhes bya ba 'di ni
286a1('bum): glo bur du byutags pa ste/ mying la yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang myi myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin dang / so so yang dag par
286a2('bum): rig pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 
286a3('bum): mying la yang byams pa chen po myed/ byams pa chen po la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir/ 
286a4('bum): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang snying rje chen po med
286a5('bum): snying rje ldan pa la yang mying med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sna rje chen po gang len pa de gnyisate ka yang med cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste
286a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni glo bu ru du mying du btags pa ste/ myang
286a7('bum): la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la myang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang
286b1('bum): yin pa de gnyis ka yang myeng cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying sam mo// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'a
286b2('bum): glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang thams cad shes pa nyid myed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la yang myong mad ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid gang yin pa
286b3('bum): de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra lta bu 'di lta ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni
286b4('bum): glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ mying la yang lam gyi rnam pa/ shes pa nyid myed / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa
286b5('bum): sa kyi rnam pa shes pa 'od gang yin pa gnyis sa kyi gsa'abyor / chu soms dang nas bya 'a myong ma mi/ tshe dang ldan pa
286b6('bum): bu 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du barmugs po ste/ ming la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen de pa nyid myed/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid la yang myang myed/ 
286b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'angan
286b8('bum): mying tsam mo// bam po// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
287a1('bum): gang yang 'di skad du dper na bdag ni bdag ces bya ste/ bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o// dper na sems can thams can zhes bya ste/ dper na sems can shin tu mngon par grub bo/ dper na srog/ 
287a2('bum): srog ces bya ste/ srog shi nad tu mngon par ma grub bo/ dper na 'gro ba 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ 'gro ba shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ dper na gso ba gso ba zhes bya ste/ gso ba shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ dper
287a3('bum): na skyes bu skyes bu zhes bya ste/ skyes bu shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ dper na gang zag gang zag ces bya ste/ gang zag shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ dper na shed can zhes bya ste/ shed can shin tu mngon pa
287a4('bum): grub bo/ dper na shed bdag shed bdag ces bya ste/ shed bdag shin tu rnam par ma grub bo// dper na byed pa po byed pa po zhes byaste/ byed pa po shin tu mngon par grub bo/ dper na tshor ba po tshor ba
287a5('bum): bo zhes bya ba ste/ tshor ba po shi nang tu mngon par ma grub po/ dper na shes pa po shes pa po zhes bya ste/ shes po po shi nad tu mo ngon par ma grub bo/ dper na mthong ba po mthong ba po zhes bya ba ste/ 
287a6('bum): mthong ba po shi nang tu mngon par ma grub bo/ zhes ci'i phyir de skad smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag shi nang tu myed cing myi drim gas na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yang / sems/ 
287a7('bum): can shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ srog shi nang tu med cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod 'gro ba shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ 
287a8('bum): de mngon par 'grub par 'grub par ma 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gso ba shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ skyes bu shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par
287b1('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod gang zag shinang du myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta gang la yod/ shed can shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta gang la yod/ 
287b2('bum): shed bdag shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byed pa po shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba po sha nad tu myed cing
287b3('bum): myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod shes pa po shi nang tu med cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod mthong ba po shin tu med cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par
287b4('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod gzugs shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba shin// da tu med cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba la
287b5('bum): yod/ 'du shes shi nad tu med cing myi dmyigs na de mngon para'agrub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'du byed shi nad tu myedad myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod
287b6('bum): rnam par shes pa shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ myig shind tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba shi nad tu myed cing myi
287b7('bum): dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sna shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lce shin tu med cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur
287b8('bum): ba lta ga la yod/ lus shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yid shi ning tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gzugs shin
288a1('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sgra shi nad tu med cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par
288a2('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yong / re shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta gang la yod/ rag shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chos shin tu
288a3('bum): myemyo cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ myig gi rnam par shes pa shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na
288a4('bum): de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa/ dam tu med cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod do// lce'i rnam par shes pa shin tu myed cing myi
288a5('bum): dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shi nad tu myed cing mi dmyigs na de mngon par 'gyur pa lta ga la yod/ yid kyi rnam par shes po shin tu
288a6('bum): myod cing myi dmyigs na da mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ltag la yod myig gi 'dus te reg pa shinang tu myang cid myi dmigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba sa gang la yang / rna bar 'dus te rag pa shin tu myed cing myi
288a7('bum): dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ka la yod/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu myed cing myi dmyog son de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lce'i 'du rnam par shes pa shin tu myed cing
288a8('bum): myi dmyigs na de mngon par grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg bshin tu myed cing mi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu myed ci
288b1('bum): myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las/ 
288b2('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba shi nang tu med cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga
288b3('bum): la yod/ lce'i 'dus te rog pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shi nad tu myed cing mi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ 
288b4('bum): de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg dpa las byung ba'i tshor ba shi nang tu myed cing mi dmyigs na/ mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lA ga la yod/ sa'i khams/ 
288b5('bum): shin tu med cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ltag la yod/ chu'i khams shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de ma don par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ me'i khams sha ning tu med
288b6('bum): cing myi dmyigs nad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rlung gi khams shind tu myad cing myi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nam mkha'i kham so shin tu myed cing myi ngo myigs
288b7('bum): nade mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shi nang tu med cing myi dmyigs na// de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod / ma rig pa shin tu myed cing myi dmyigos nod
288b8('bum): mngon par 'gyurab bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'du byad shin tu myad cing myi dmyigs na/ dmangon par 'grob par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rnam par shes pa shin tu myad cing myi dmyigs na do mngon por 'grub pa'i
289a1('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mying dang gzugs shi na tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub pa lta ga la yod/ rnam par shes pa shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta
289a2('bum): ga la yod/ reg pa shi nad tu med cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yang / tshor ba shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sred pa shi nang tu myed cing myi
289a3('bum): dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lto ga la yang / le nad pa sho nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ srid pa shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba
289a4('bum): lho ga la yod/ skye ba shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
289a5('bum): pa shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs ni de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta/ ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shi nang tu myang cang myi dmyigs/ na de mngon par 'grob par 'gyur ba lta ga la
289a6('bum): yod bzod pa'i pha ro la na pa zhin dum cing myi myigs na mdzin par 'grul bar 'gyur ba lhag la yod/ brtson 'grus kyi pa yod du na pazhin myong cing myi myigs ni de mngon par 'grib bar 'gyur/ 
289a7('bum): lhag la yang / mam ga nag pa'i yang tu sbyin do shin du du mye kyi myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub bar 'gyur ba lhag mi yod/ shes rabakye pa'i lang du byed pagon du myang cing myi dmyigs ni/ dman / 
289a8('bum): 'bru pa sngags 'dag nga rnye banyi ninang da ci myo phyogs man par 'grang bar gyur ba sngags meng / dang pa nyid shin du mang tsong byi myig sa ni mngon por 'gyung bar 'gyu / 
289b1('bum): ga la yod/ phyi stong pa nyid shind tu med cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur pa lta ga la yod stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chen po stong pa
289b2('bum): nyid shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu myang
289b3('bum): cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shi nang tu myed cing mi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu myeng
289b4('bum): cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ thogam dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yang / dor ba myed pa
289b5('bum): stong pa nyid gnad du mya bang myi dmyigs na da mngon par 'grub par 'gyubalta ga la yod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu myed cing myi dmyig sa na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chos ma/ 
289b6('bum): cad stong pa nyid gan do myu ba mo dmyigs na dmangon par 'igrub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang gyi mtshan nyid srung pa zhi gon tu myong cing myi dmyigs na/ ri mngon pan 'grub par 'gyur ba lda ga la yod/ 
289b7('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gan du myed cing myo dmyigs ni de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos pa myed pa stong pa nyid shinang du myang cing myi dmyigs ni mtshan par 'grub par 'gyur ba sgrag ma yong/ 
289b8('bum): nyid shin pa du myed cing rgya dmyigs na dmangon par 'grub par 'grub bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos pa med pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid gnang du mang cing myo dmyigs na/ dmangon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la ya/ 
290a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta
290a2('bum): ga la yod/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams shi nad tu med cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod dbang po rnams shi nad tu med cing mi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ stobs
290a3('bum): rnams shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon por 'grub por 'gyur ba lnga ga la yod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shan tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'phags
290a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de dag mdo/ na par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'phags pa'o/ ngan pa rnams shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par
290a5('bum): grub par 'gyur ba lta go la yod/ bcom gton noms shin tu mya myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga ying / chad myed pa rnams shin tu myong cing myi dmyigs na de dag
290a6('bum): mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lnga ga la yod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yang / rnam par thar pa brgyad shin tu myed ceng
290a7('bum): myi dmyigs ni de dag mngon par 'grung bar 'gyur ba lta gol yod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shinang du myad cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yong/ 
290a8('bum): par tho rad pa'i sgra snang ga nyid dang mtshan ma myang pa dang na pa med pa zhin du myed cing myi dmyigs na mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta gang la meng / mngon par shes pa rnams shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na nga/ 
290b1('bum): mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tingange 'dzind rnams shin tu med cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams shi nad tu med cing mi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par
290b2('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shinang tu med cing mi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ myi 'jigs pa rnams shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par 'grub
290b3('bum): bar bya gyur pa lnga ga la yong so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shind du meng cing myo phyogs na de dag mngon par 'grub bar 'gyur bar lhag sa yang / byams pa chen po shin tu myang citsong myo dmyigaso nang dag medan par 'grub par 'a
290b4('bum): ba lta ga la yod/ snying rje chen po shi nang tu med cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngo ldan par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma ra 'dres pa bco brgyad sha nang tu med cing myi dmyigs na de dag mngon par
290b5('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga lta yod/ nyan thos shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyi// gsan de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rangs ngas rgyas shind tu med cing mi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur
290b6('bum): ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga lnga yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shi nang tu myang cing / 
290b7('bum): myi dmyigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na bdag bdag ces bya ste/ bdag shind tu mngon par 'grub pa myed/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gang
290b8('bum): chos thams cad kyang de bzhin du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam zhes zer ba ni/ cha dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du bya ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myong/ 
291a1('bum): ru n+de la lu wA b+ha bI ngan myi myo 'du byed la 'du ba la sa byung bI ngo bo nyid med// 
291a2('bum): ga ngasha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa me dang ldan parab 'byor gang la 'du ba las byed pa'i mang po nyid myong ba yin/ smras pa che dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med du/ tshor ba la 'du ba las
291a3('bum): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// du phyi pa lungasas su ba'i po nyi tu dang// rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu mig la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myang ngo // rna ba'i
291a4('bum): 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ sna la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myeng ngo // lce la 'dra ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// lus la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myong ngo / yid la 'du ba ba las byung ba'i tshor ngo bo nyid mud do// 
291a5('bum): gzugs la 'dra ba las byung ngo'i dzi sa nyid myed de/ sku la 'dugal sa byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed de/ dri la 'du ba las byung ba nga po 'di/ dang / rol 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myong ngo // reg la 'du bo las
291a6('bum): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung dri'i rje bo nyid myed do/ rno ba'i rnam par sheso pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i
291a7('bum): ji na nyid myed do/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ lha'o rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed / yid kyi
291a8('bum): par shes pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las 'du ba las byung ngo'i ngo bo nyid myang ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byun
291a9('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// lce'i rnam pa 'dus te reg pa las 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myang ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung
291b1('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myang ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'dus te ba las byung
291b2('bum): ba'aji 'i nyid nasas/ yid kyi dus te dag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba lda dre ba khyod myed do/ sa ga khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// nu'i khams la 'dru ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// skye'i khams la
291b3('bum): la byu ba da/ mam nyi spyad do// sa chu nyi byed do// bya nas pas 'dugs da myed
291b4('bum): rgod mung do/ med pa la 'du ba mi byung ba ma nyid byeng de/ da pa 'os 'du 'is byung ba nga pa nyid myang ngo // sring po'i 'chu bas mabyung 'ong ba nyid bye sa 'a
291b5('bum): 'du ba'am blang sa da / sbyid pa ya myed pa la du las byu 'dos da dang / rdus ma byed pa lu ma rgyad ma
291b6('bum): sa chu ba'i margyam nyid byed/ yan 'thung kyi ba mi tu pa/ 'dri mi byed de/ ma gnagapa sa ma da mye / 
292a1('bum): ka tu phyind pa la 'du bya las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// nang stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myad ngo do// phyi stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'du ba las
292a2('bum): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// chen po stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid
292a3('bum): myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myengado// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// 
292a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid du myed do/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i
292a5('bum): bo nyid nga myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byu / ngo ba'i ngo bo nyid myong ngo / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'dub las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myang ngo // myi dmyigs pa stong pa
292a6('bum): nyid la 'du bya las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid lnga 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
292a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la 'dri ba las byung ngo ba nyid myed do// don pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid mang ngo/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// 
292a8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// dbang po rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// stobs rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// byang chub
292b1('bum): kyi yan la ga rnams la 'du ba las byung 'di bo nyid byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas 'du ba las byung ba'i po 'a med do/ 'phags pa'i den pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba jo mo nyid myed / 
292b2('bum): bsam gtan rnams la 'du bya las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid mye dang/ rnam par thar pa'i brgyad la 'du ba las byang ba'i
292b3('bum): nyid myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyi da dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smind pa myed pa lnga 'du ba las
292b4('bum): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ mngon par shes pa rnams la 'du ba/ las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// ting 'dzind rnams la 'dug las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
292b5('bum): la 'du ba las byung ba 'ang bo nyid myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ myi 'jogs pa bzhi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myedado// so so
292b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// byams pa chen po la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid mang ngo // snying rje chen po la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ sangs rgyas kyi
292b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
292b8('bum): bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni myi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang chos thams cad ni myi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin
293a1('bum): pa dag ga narnas rmed pa shA / sgra rdzogs myi ga pa sdu ga dang yang bras ngas ma yin no// tsho pa myirtag pa ste/ gang dang nga bral bsam ldan no// 'du shes kyi rtag pa/ 
293a2('bum): nas su yin/ ga da do// shes pa bye ga / nga gras sa ma tshan/ med ldan pan kyi du tsus kyi / gang
293a3('bum): dras pas ma yin no// rna'i sbyi go pa ste/ gang dang yong dros rjes du ma yin no// mo rtag pa ste gang dang dral bas ma yin no// lce myi rtag pa ste gang dang bral bas ma yin no// sus myirtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral
293a4('bum): ngas ma yin no// ming myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzugs myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bras bas ma yin no// sgra myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma
293a5('bum): yin no// dri myi rnyog pa sta gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// mya ga pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// reg pa myi rtag pasde gang dang yang bral ba ma yin no// chos myi rtag pa ste gang
293a6('bum): yang rnam dasam ldan do/ mi dang ldan pa shar ti'i dri mug garnam pa shes pa myi dag pa ste gang dang yang rnal pas ma yin na/ na pa'i rnam par zhes pa myi rtag pa swaM/ gang dang yang bral thos ma yin ni/ 
293a7('bum): rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa ste gang deng yang bral bas mi yin no/ lce'i rnaM ma ma zhes pa myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma man
293a8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral pos ma yin no// rdza ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi ra/ 
293b1('bum): ste gang dang yang rnam pas ma yin no// snga'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag pa ste gang dang bral bas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag pa ste gang
293b2('bum): dang yang bral bas ma yin no// yid kyi/ 'dus te reg pa mi rtag pa ste gang Nadang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu nad kyis tshor ba myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang dral
293b3('bum): bas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tsher po myi rtag pa ste/ ro gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// snalce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
293b4('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// lusagyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba mya rtag pa ma ste gang dang / bral bas ma yin no/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
293b5('bum): tshor ba myi rtag pa ste/ 6 gang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas mi yin no// chu'i khams myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas
293b6('bum): ma yin no// mye'i khams mi rtag pa ste gang dang bral bas ma yin no/ rlung gi khams mi dag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// rnam par
293b7('bum): shes pa'i khams myi rtag po ste gang dang dral bas ma yin natsha dung ldan pa shar dro ti'i bu ma rig pa myi rtag pu ste/ gang dang yang dral bas ma yin no// 'du byed mi rtag pa ste gang yang bral bas ma yin ni/ rnam
293b8('bum): par zhes pa myi rtog pa ste gang dang pral bas ma yin no// myong dang gtsug/ su myi rtags ste gang dang mang dral bas ma yin no// skye mched drug myi rtag pa ste gang dong yang bral bas ma yin no/ reg pa myi rtag pa / 
294a1('bum): ga gang dang mang rnal ngas ma yin no// tshor ba myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// sred pa myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// len pa myi rtag pa ste gang dang dral bas ma yin no// sran
294a2('bum): la myi rtag pa ste gang dang bral bas ma yin no// skya ba dang po mye rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ rgo sho ma rig pa ste gang dang yang dral bas ma yin na/ tshe dang ljon pa shar dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
294a3('bum): myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// brtson/ 
294a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa mi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
294a5('bum): mi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ba ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag par ste/ gang dang yang bral las
294a6('bum): ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste/ gang yang bral bas ma yin na/ 
294a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 
294a8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang
294b1('bum): yang bral bas ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag pa gang dang yang brald pas ma yin no// / nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral
294b2('bum): bas ma yin no// myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste gang yang bral bas ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral

294b4('bum): spong ba rnams myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 'phrul ga rkang pa rnams myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bsam yi dan ni/ dbang po rnams myi rtags ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin na/ 
294b5('bum): spobs rnams myi rtog pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag
294b6('bum): pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yino/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag po ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// chang
294b7('bum): yin na/ mothar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag myi rtag po ste gang dang mang dral bas ma yin no/ rnam par bar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang sman po myang pa myi rtag paste gang dang yang bral
295a1('bum): bas ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag pa ste gang dang bral bas ma yin no// ting nge 'dzinang rnams myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bse ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag
295a2('bum): pa ste gang dang yang ma bral bas ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ myo 'jigs pa bzhi myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ 
295a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// byams pa chen po myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// snying rje chen po myi rtag pa ste gang yin dang yang bral
295a4('bum): bas ma yin no/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi rtag po sgo gang dang yang bral bas ma yin ni/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de tshe dang ldan po sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar myi rtag pa ste/ 
295a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa dang zad pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dri ti'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni myi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan
295a6('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste gang yang bral bras ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral ba
295a7('bum): ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang chos thams cad sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de dag gang yin pa/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs/

295b1('bum): ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig bsdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no//

295b7('bum): par shes pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang yin dang yang bral bas ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
295b8('bum): ba ste gang dang ying bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang bral bas ma yin no// na pa'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang
296a1('bum): bral bas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa

296a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang deng yang bral bas ma yino/ 'di byed sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yinade rna bar shes pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral khas ma yin/ 
296b1('bum): myong dang gzugs sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// skye mched drug sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang dral bas ma yin no// reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshor ba
